hymns.title: All people that on earth do Dwell
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 1. All people that on earth do Dwell
verses: Mwe bantu bonse ba pa nshi, Mulumbanyeni, mutote, No kumutemwa iseni, Imbeni pa cinso cakwe.
Ibukisheni ni Lesa, Atubumbile fwe bonse; alatucema nge mpanga, Pantu ifwe tuli bakwe.
Ingelieni no mucinshi, Shi palameni no kwanga, ‘Shina lyakwe lumbuleni, ici cine e cisuma.
Lesa wesu e musuma, Ali no luse kuli fwe; ‘Cine cakwe ciminina ‘Nshiku ne nshiku shonse pe.

hymns.title: O Worship the king
verses: Itoteleni
’Mfumu nkalamba, Imbileni mwe ’Luse na maka’ Ni nkwela yakosa ’Kutitucingwe, Kwi sano e kwaba Ku mulu kwine.
Imbenya maka, ’Cikuku pamo, ’Busamo nkansu, ’Mulu e sano; ’Mwela na makumbi E wafilenga; ’Cipupu ne mfifi E mo endela.
’Calo na fyonse Ifyasangwamo, Fyabumbwa kale Ku maka yakwe. Acipampamike Kwi funde lyape, Abika mabemba Yacilibishe.
’Bupe bwa mwine Bwa kupapisha, Ni mu lwelele Na mu kasuba; Bwatula ku mpili, Bwaya ku nika, Bwaisa mu mume, Buli mu mfula.
’Bena lukungu ’Banaka ni fwe, Twamusumina, Talaya bufi; Ubupe busuma E bo twapelwa, Kabumba, kacinga, Na Kalubula.
Ni’mwe lubuto, Ni’mwe uluse. ’Bangeli pamo Bamwibila pe.
Pamo ne fwe bene Mu nyimbo shesu, Ne ndimi sha cine Twimbilyo mulu.

hymns.title: Holy, Holy, Holy
verses: Imwe mwalibuta, Lesa mu mulu, Pa kacelocelo lwimbo twamwimbila; Imwe mwalibuta, bal use na maka, Lesa patatu, twamulumbanya.
Imwe mwalibuta, benu baletota, ’Kubike fitebo ku makasa yenu; Bonsha ba mu mulu bamufukamina, Imwe ba kale, mwakulabapo.
Imwe mwalibuta, muli ulubuto, ’Menso ya babipa te ’ti yamumone. Mwalibuta mweka, na bambi tapali, Ni’mwe ba maka, ni’mwe bal use.
Imwe mwalibuta, Lesa mu mulu, Imilimo yenu ilamulumbanya; Imwe mwalibuta, bal use na maka, Lesa patatu, twamulumbanya.

hymns.title: O God our Help
verses: Mwe Lesa, Kafwa wa kale, Twamucetekela; Cubo cesu ku cipupu, Ne ng’anda yesu pe.
Abntu benu batemwe, Apo mubabaka; ’Kuboko kwenu kwa maka Kwakulatucinga.
‘Lintwi mpili tashalipo, ‘Calo conse pamo, Mu nshita shoonse mwe Lesa Mwaikala umo.
Kuli imwe myaka ingi Ngo bushiku bumo; ‘Nshiku shesu na sho bwipi Ngo mumyo lucelo.
‘Myaka yay ngo mumana, Abantu balafwa, Balabwe fintu cilabwa ‘Ciloto lucelo.
Mwe Lesa kafwa wa kale, Twamucetekela; Mutulame nshiku shonse Fwe bantu mwatemwa.

hymns.title: Let us with a Gladsome Mind
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 5. Let us with a Gladsome Mind
verses: Tusekele no kwanga, Pantu Lesa musuma.
Pantu aba no luse
Pa bantu bakwe bonse
Bonse tumutotele, Ni Lesa eka wene.
Icalo abumbile, Ne fyaba umo mwine.
Aba ne fintu fyonse, Alatulela bonse.
Alebata ngilila ’Bantu bakwe mu nshila.
Ku luse atumona, Nangu tusekelele, Lesa tumulumbanye.

hymns.title: Rejoice the Lord is king
verses: Tusekelyo Mwine Ni Mfumu ya bantu, Tumutotele fwe, No kwimbile Mfumu.
Imye shiwi no mutima, Sekela no kusekela.
Yesu ni Katula, Aleteka bantu; Ilya’tufwilile Aile ku mulu.
Ubufumu bwakwe Te kuti bupwe ‘yo; Ulusa akwata Lwa mfwa no lwa ku Mbo.
Kwa lesa e kwali, Basukya balwani Banashiwe pa nshi Ya makasa yakwe.
Tucetekele fwe, Akabwela Kristu ‘Kututwala bonse Ku mwesu ku mulu.

hymns.title: Praise my soul
verses: We mutima, ulumbanye Mfumu yesu ya mulu; Walubulwa, waelelwa, N’ani wa kwimbilo lu?
Ulumbanye, ulumanye, Lumbanye Mfumu ya pe.
Mulumbanishisho bupe, Batata bapelwo bu; Mu busanso baikele, Abapokolwelemo.
Atuteka ngo mufyashi, Alishibe fyo twaba; Mu maboko atusenda, No kutupokolola.
Bonse mu mulu mutwafwe ‘Kuti tutote bwino, Mwashuka ukaba mankwe, Mwamumona pa menso.

hymns.title: O for a Thousand Tongues
verses: Indimi shingi ndefwaya Sha kwimbila Yesu; Ifya bucindami bwakwe, No luse ne nkumbu.
Afulunganye fya bubi, Akakula nkole; Amusamba no mulopa, Leka ansambe’ne
Asosa; baumfwe shiwi, abafwa baima, Basekela abakabi, Baanga bapina.
Mumfwe, we wakoma matwi; Cibulu, mulumbe; We mpofu, mone Mfumwi yi; Cilema, ciluka.
Yesu e shina lisuma, litamfyo bulanda, lyawamisha ku babipa, ‘mutende no mweo.
Mwe mfumu Lesa Shikulu, Mungafwe ukwimba; No kuti nshimike pe fye ‘Shine li lisuma.

hymns.title: We praise we worship Thee
verses: Twamulumbanya mwe Lesa, amaka yenu twaimba; Abena fyalo batota Kuli imwe, mwe ba shifwe.
Ni Aleluya twaimba, Pamo na bangeli bonse; ‘Ba mu mulu, ‘ba pano nse Balamwimbila pen a pe.
Baleti: Ba mushilo mwe Lesa mutotelwa konse: Panwe sonde na mu mulu, Mulimo ne fya bukulu.
‘Batumikishya balipo, Batufukishisho lwimbo, Bakasesema babula Fyonse fya bu Aleluya.
Na ‘bwa bafwilile Mfumu, Balemwawila mu mulu: ‘Cilonganino ca pano Ciletotela capamo.
‘lulumbi lube kuli ‘mwe, Mwe Lesa Shifwe pen a pe; Ku mwana na ku Mupashi, Lesa umo wa mu mulu.

hymns.title: Natotelwe Lesa, alifulwile, Atemenwe calo, apele mwane: Uwatufwilile e lambo lyesu, Atwiswilo mulu ‘fwe twingilemo.
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 10. Natotelwe Lesa, alifulwile, Atemenwe calo, apele mwane: Uwatufwilile e lambo lyesu, Atwiswilo mulu ‘fwe twingilemo.
verses: Mwimbile! Mwimbile! ‘calo cumfwe na co.
Mwimbile! Mwimbile! Babe no Buseko.
Isa kuli Lesa mu Mwana wakwe, umulumbanishe,, alifulwile.
Ubu bulubulo ubwa mulopa, E bulayo bwine ku wasumina, Na ku wabipisha nga asumina, kashita Kenya ko alaelelwa.
Alitufundisha, alituwamya, Na ifwe twalyanga mu mwana wakwe, Lelo tukacila mu kusekela, ilyo tukacila tukamona Yesu katula.

hymns.title: Ye Servants of God
verses: Mwe bena Lesa, Akulumbeni, Shi shimikeni Ishina lyakwe: ishine lyacimfya ilya kwa Yesu, Ubufumu bwakwe Bwaanda konse.
Lesa ’liteka, wa maka yonse; aba mupepi Na bantu bakwe. Ne cilonganino cilemwimbila, bati, ‘’Ululumbi Lupelwe Yesu.’’
Ipusukilo Ni Lesa eka; Bonse bapunde, Bamucindike. Balumbanya Yesu ‘Bangeli bene, Bamuwila pa nshi, Bamulotela.
Twimbile bonse, Tumupe fyonse: ‘Lulumbya, maka, ‘Mano no mweo. ‘Bucindamo bonse, Na matotelo, Twakulamupela Tucili pano.

hymns.title: My God How Wonderful
verses: Lesa wandi ndemutasha, Busamo bwa cine, ‘Cifulo cenu busaka, Calibutisha pe.
Te ‘ti mpende myaka yenu, Muli Lesa w ape. Akasuba no bushiku ‘Bangeli batota.
Kumumona e cisuma, Mwe Mfumu Shikulu. Muliba mano na maka, mwalibuta tutu.
Mwe mfumu nalimutemwa, bam aka yonse ‘mwe, Lelo mwafwaya ne mwano Ukuti ncilepo.
Nangu tat nangu mayo  Takuli pano nse abatemwe fyo mwantemwa Ne mwano wabipa.
Wishi kwa Yesu, Katula, Cikabe cisuma Ukulamufukamina, No kumulolesha.

hymns.title: The lord is king
verses: Shikulu e Mfumu; calo Cisekele ne myulu. Konse konse cilumbuke ifyo Shikulu e Shifwe.
Shikulu e Mfumu; n’ani wingapamo kumukana? Nelyo Kumunwntaula, No kukanamusumina?
Shikulu e Mfumu; ‘Mwine e kapingula wa cine; ‘Nshila shakwe sha cishinka, abantu besemuwila.
Ateka; mwe basambi mwe, Mwakulalumbanya Shifwe, Na Yesu’waba mu mulu Uwatanikwe ngo muntu.
Bushe Lesa engaluba, No luse lwakwe lukapwe? Ni’fyo abakwe beleka Kwimbe fyo Shifwe ateka.

hymns.title: I sing the Almighty power
verses: Nyimba maka ya kwa Lesa, Ayalenge mpili, Ayabika na mabemba, Ne fya mulu fyonse.
Nyimba maano ayatusha Kasube nshiku pe; No mweshi wa kubalika, E ne ntanda shonse.
Nyimba busumo bufusha ifilyo mu calo, Fya mweo fyonse alenga, Ati, ‘’fyawame fyo’’.
Maluba yonse pano nse yalumbanya Lesa, Fipupu e na makumbi fyaumfwa kuli’mwe.
Utwa mweo twa mu calo twabakwa na Lesa, Konse konse mu fifulo e pwali, amona.
Alembaka no kuboko, No kuntungulula. Naine nshakamulabe, ‘ Unsunge nshiku pe.

hymns.title: Eternal light
verses: Lwa ciyayaya, ‘lubuto’, fyo engabutisha Uwaikala na imwe, Tatina, lelo ne nseko atemwa,’lolesha atemwa, ‘lolesha.
Mipashi yaikalako Yene yabelela, lelo yeka yaba ifyo, Tayaikele pa calo, Tayali yabipa.
Yangu, ine ne wa mfifi mfike uko shani, ku kumoneka kwa Lesa No ko kubengeshiminwa? Lubuto luloca!
Kuli inshile yayako, Kulyo kwawamisha; Kuli ilambo lya cine, No mupashi wa mushilo, e na ndubulwila.
Ifi filetuteyanyo kwikalo ko kwine; Aba mfifi no bushiku Bemgekala mu lubuto pantu kulyu luse.

hymns.title: Holy is the Lord
verses: Wa mushilo, wene e Mfumu, Mwe bantwi mbeni, mufukamine. Pe shiwi mpili shitutume, Ne milundu nay o icinkwe. Mano na mak, ‘congwe cafula, Lesa e Mfumu iya bonse.
Wa mushilo, wene e Mfumu,
Ne milundu nay o icankwe.
Mwimbileni, shi mwawileni. Bakashimika shi mulumbeni. Mfwa ne fibi alonaula, Fyalo fyonse fikamulumba Mumulumbanya mwe baumumona, ‘Ba mu busamo bwacilisha.
Wene akalatotelwa pe, E fyo bamwane bamutotele; Na mu mulu tukamwimbila, Tukesatula ifya bupe. Kumupalanya pa kushibuka, Tukamumona no kwimbila.

hymns.title: Ten Thousand Times.
verses: Makana na makana ya bafwikwa tutu, ifita fya balubulwa fyanina ku mulu. Fyapwa! Fyonse nafipwa, Ukulwa ne fibi; beswileni ifipata, Aba kabengile. Aleluya, aleluya, ku watufwilile. Aleluya, aleluya, Na o aliimine.
Nyimbo sha Aleluya Mu calo, mu mulu! ‘Kulisha kwa masese kuletwebo bwanshisho. We bushiku busuma Bwa fyabumbwa fyonse; we nseko, ulefumyapo ubulanda bonse.
E, tukaceleshanya Mu mulu mwi shilya; pa kukumanye fibusa No kushilekana. Amenso yakabeka, ‘Yalile filamba, Tabalimo bakashiwa, Nelyo mukamfwilwa.
‘Bupususho nabwise, we lambo lyawama; mufishe mpendwa ya bantu abo mwalubula; balangeni cishibilo, mwe Mfumu, katula.

hymns.title: Praise Him! Praise Him!
verses: Lumbanyeni Yesu uwatulubula, Imbishe bonse ba pano se; Celeleni Yesu, mwe bali mu mulu, ishina lipelwe ‘bucindamo. Nga kacema yesu abaka bana, mu maboko alabasenda pe.
Lumbanyeni, lumbuleni ubukulu
Mwimbileni no lwimbo pen na pe.
Lumbanyeni Yesu uwatulubula, Aculile, apelelwe, afwe; Wene libwe lyesu ilya bupususho, celeleni Yesu watanikwe. Temwisheni Yesu watufwilile, ‘Luse, congwe, no kutemwa kwa pe.
Lumbanyeni Yesu uwatulubula, Na Hosana ku mulu kwaumfwa; Yesu wene abelelelyo kuteka, Lumbanyeni katula ne mfumu. Uwa kwisa e ukacimfya bonse, alikwata maka no lulumbi.

hymns.title: With Harps and with Viols
verses: Ne sese ne penga ‘bengi baliko, Na mu cinso ca mfumu bembo lwimbo lu:
Kuli uyo watutemwa, watulubula,
Kuli wenyu lulumbi inshiku shonse.
Abalya babipa basangululwa, Nabafwikwe fyabuta no kwimba pamo:
Few bali basangu atucite mfumu, atufundisha nomba twimbyo lwimbo lu:
Twalubite mu mfifi, twali abasha, lelo alitusamba, twasangululwa:
Tumulumbanishe Imfumu Yesu, ‘Kuti bambi pa kumfwa bamwimbilyo lu:

hymns.title: All Hail the Power
verses: Tulumbanisha maka ye shina lya kwa Yesu; abangeli na bantu fye,
Balumbanye shina,
‘shina lya kwa Yesu.
Abafwile balumbanye ’wanina ku mulu; wa kwi shinte lya kwa yese,
Abasumina pano nse, abwa balubuka; Na baletulwa no luse,
Abelelwa te kulaba ifyo aculile; bamuletele ubupe,
Mi shonse sha pano nse; Balete kuno mucinshi,
’Ba pano nse, ‘ba mu mulu, Bonse bamuwile; Bembeulwimbo lumo fye.

hymns.title: God moves in a Mysterious way
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 21. God moves in a Mysterious way
verses: Lesa ‘cite fingelengwe Kubombe milimo; alenda na pa cambeshi, E, na mu cipupu.
Mwe bantu bakwa batina, ikoselesheni, ico mwatina, caleta ‘Bupalo kuli mwe.
Mifwile yakwe yonse yalasokoloka; icalula pa kubala, pa numa calowa.
Bushimino bwibipa Te kuti bwiluke; leso mwine nga ‘ilula, walaishibisha.

hymns.title: All creatures of our God
verses: Fibumbwa fyonse fya pa nshi Aleni, twimbile Mfumu. Aleluya, aleluya. We kasuba wabalika, nobe we mweshi bushiku, Mulumbanye, mulumbanye; aleluya, aleluya aleluya.
We mwela wa cipupu we, we kumbi wayo lubilo, mulumbanye, Aleluya. Kuca kulatashe mfumu, myengelele, imye shiwi, mulumbanye, mulumbanye: aleluya, aleluya, Aleluya
Mumana we mu kupita, bulo lwimbo no kutasha Mfumu Lesa, shi imbeni. Mulilo wa kwafwa pantu, No kubapelo lubuto, imye shiwi, mulumbanye: aleluya, aleluya, aleluya.
We mayo calwe nshiku pe watupe fya kulya fyonse, ulu lwimbo mwimbileni. Fimuti na maluba mwe, langenyu lulumbi lwakwe, toteleni mfumu Lesa: aleluya, aleluya, aleluya.
Abatemwana mu bantu, Abelelana, imbeni, Temwisheni Mfumu yenu. Na balecule nshiku pe, basansamuke, babule shiwi ili lya kutota: aleluya, aleluya, aleluya.
We mfwa waisa kuli fwe, mu kutalala, shili, tatutina, we munensu, ni ‘we nkombe ya kwa shifwe, watwalo mwana ku mwabo. We ,mfwa, mune, we mutembo aleluya, aleluya, aleluya.
Fibumbwa fyonse fya panshi, filumbanye no mucinshi lesa wesu, ‘Mfumu yesu, Tasheni shifwe no mwana, na o mupashi wabuta. Lumbanyeni, batashani: aleluya, aleluya, aleluya.

hymns.title: Christians awake!
verses: Shibukeni bonse ba kwa kristu alifyalwa katula wa bantu; imbeni mulumbanye uluse luntu balelumbula bangeli; kuli abwe landwe lyatendeke, lya kwa yesu, mwana wa mushimbe.
Kuli bakacema lyasoselwe, e baumfwilyo mungeli, ati; Namuletele landwe lisuma, ilya kufyalwa kwa katula, ilelo lesa cito bulayo, acifyalwa katula, ni kristu.’
Asosele, nge lyo line bonse mu nyimbo sha lubuto, bangeli batendekyo kulumbulo luse lwa bulubulo bwa mupusushi; batile, ‘’lulumbi kuli lesa, ku ba mu calo nab o mutende.’’
Twikatishe mu mitima yesu uluse lwa kwa lesa ku bantu twamumono yu watulubula, wa mwi tanga, uwa ku lupanda; tumukonke, akulatwafwa pe kufika ku mwesu mu lulumbi.
Twafwaya mwi bumba lya bangeli ukwimbo lwimbo lwa kwa katula; uyo wafyalwa pa bushiku’bu akatulango lulumbi ulu; luse lwakwe e lwatupususha, mu mulu mfumu tukalumbanya.

hymns.title: O come all ye faithful
verses: Mwise mutote, mwe ba busumino, iseni ku mwine ku mbetleyemu; tuye tumone mwine wa ku mulu.
Mwise tumutotele
Mwise tumutotele
Mwise tumutotele
Kristu mfumu.
Lesa wa bumi, ‘mwine wa lubuto, uyo wafyalilwe mu mbetleyemu; shifwe no mwana, nobuteko bonse.
Toteni bonse, mwe bali mu mulu, angeleni lelo mu mbetleyemu; mulumbanyeni, e mwine wafyonse.
Mwe mfumu nomba ifwe twamuposha, imwe mwafyalilwe mu mbetleyemu; Ni mwana lesa, aishilyo muntu.

hymns.title: Hark! The herald angels
verses: Umfweni aba ku mulu balelumbanye mfumu; ilelo yatufyalilwa ukututwikishanya. Imeni mwe bena fyalo, ne ndimi imbeni na sho; atufyalilwa kristu, mu mushi mbetleyumu.
Umfwenya ba ku mulu,
Balelumbanye mfumu.
Ba mu mulu batotela kristu shikulu w ape; nomba atumonekela, e mwana wa mushimbe. Bulesa buli mu muntu, muceleleleni mwe bantu, aikala muli few, yesu ni imanyule.
Celeleni wa mutende, no yo wa bololoke;
Lubuto, mweo aleta, aiso kutuposha. Ku lulumbi afumako, ukutya bantu bekafwa; afyalilwa bantu Babe aba kwa kristu.
Mwe bafwaikwa ku bantu, mwikale kuno mwesu; ni’mwe mwana wa mushimbe, mutwanshishe ifibi. Twimbe na bwa balubulwa: ‘’imfumu yatufyalilwa; ululumbi mu mulu, No mutende pa bantu.’’

hymns.title: As with Gladness
verses: Fintwa bantu ba kale ulutanda bamwene, fintu balucelele, lwaleya, lwabalike; ifyo fine, mwe mfumu, tutwalwe na ku mulu.
Fintu baya no kwang, kuli imwe ku ng’anda, ku kumufukamina, untu baletotela; ifyo fine, mwe mfumu, tumufwaya ku mulu.
Fintwa bantu bapele bupyo bwingi bwafina; No kwanga ifyo fine tumupele fya bupe, kuli imwe, mwe mfumu, mupusushi, shikulu.
Yesu kristu nshiku pe mu lwendo mutubake; nga fyapwe fya mu calo, mukatufishe uko ukushabo lutanda lwa kututungulula.
Calo cilia ku mulu, tabafwaya lubuto; ni mwe lubuto, ‘nseko, ni mwe kasuba uko; tukembila mu mulu aleluya ku mfumu.

hymns.title: While shepherd watched
verses: Bakacema balindile Mpanga ubushiku; umungeli aikile, ‘lulumbi lwa mulu,
‘’mwilatina,’’ asoseshe abalino mwenso, ‘’Ndemuletela, na bonse, ilandwe lya nseko:
‘’mu mushi wa kwa DabidiAfyalwa ilelo, Mfumu kristu, ‘mupusushi, e bulangililo:
Mwana munono wa mulu mulemusangamo, alemoneka ku bantu, ali mu mukondo,’’
E fyo asoso wa ntanshi, e lyo lyamoneka ibumba ilya bangeli balumbanya lesa:
‘’ululumbi kuli lesa, mutende mu calo, fya busuma fyatendeka nomba no kupwa ‘kupwa ‘yo’’.

hymns.title: It came upon the midnight
verses: Lyaishile ubushiku, ilandwe lya kale, lyafumine ku bangeli, abasoso kuti: ‘’Mutende ube mu calo ufume ku mulu,’’ Bantunse babe tondolo, bomfwe abangeli.
Ku fyabipa ne fya bulwi ‘Bantunse bacula, imyaka yapita ingi lya fyabipisha. Abalelwa te ba kumfwa ulwimbo lwa luse; shi talaleni mwe bantu, mfumfwe abngeli.
Mwe bafininwa ne fibi, mwe basakamikwa, mwe baleendo bulendo lubomba lubomba. Inukeni! Nshita ipya yaiso lubilo; Tusheni muno mu nshila, mumfwe abangeli.
Moneni nshiku shaisa, ishalelumbulwa na kasesema wa kale, inshiku shawama,. E iyo mutende ukesafika konse konse; ne fyalo fyonse fyonse fyaimba .lwimbo lwa bangeli.

hymns.title: To us a child of Hope
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 29. To us a child of Hope
verses: Afyalilwa kuli ifwe untu alolelwa; ba mu mulu batotela, Na bantu mu calo.
Uwa mutende e shina, afuma ku mulu; wa finjelengwe, wa maka, wa bonse ni mfumu.
Amaka te’ti yakapwe, akalabateka, no bololoke mu mulu, mutende mu calo.

hymns.title: Come sing the sweet song
verses: Imbeni ulwimbo lwa kale, ulwimbo lwa imanyule, lwafuma ku mwinshi wa muluulwa kulumbanye mfumu.
Ikatisheni no kusansula; icalo casuka ne nseko, ulwimbo lwe landwe ili.
Bakasesema basosele, leso mwine e wapanga, nomba conse nacicitika, twalumbanya kalubula.
Imyaka balecetekela ukwisa kwakwe pano nse, abena fyalo bafwaile kulumbule shina lyakwe.
Ulwimbo ulwacila shonse, twaimbile mfumu yesu, twatasho waisalubula, ni manyule, yesu kristu.

hymns.title: Once in royal David’s city
verses: Ni mu mushi wa kwa Dabid mwali tanga lya ng’ombe, umo nyina abikile umwana mu mukondo, ni maliya e nyina; Yesu kristu e mwana.
Aikele pano pa nshi, uli mfumu ya bonse; Ng’anda yakwe yali tanga, no busanshi mukondo. Aikelyo mwaice, uyo e mupusushi.
Wene e cikope cesu, akulile nga ifwe; abelyo mwana munono, aseka no kwangala, omfwo bucushi bwesu, pamo ne nseko shesu.
Nomba mwi tanga talimo, umwe ng’ombe shilala; lelo ali pamo ne fwe, na mu mulu mwa lesa. Ifwe tumupashanye, nelyo tuli baice.

hymns.title: Never shone a light to fair
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 32. Never shone a light to fair
verses: Tacabala cipona, tacabalilya cimbwa, nge nyimbo mu lwelele shaimbilya bangeli; ntanda shonse shilumbule;
Naisa uwa mutende, ku kwikala muli few, ni yesu kristu, ni yesu imanyule.
Lulya lwimbo na nomba lwaumfwikwa pa maca; e po lwacilaimbwa, lubuto lwabalika; ba pano nse balumbule;
Twacelela kasuba umo twamutotela; nga twaiso kupepa, no kumulumbanisha; fyalo fyonse filumbule.

hymns.title: O little town of Bethlehem
verses: Akamushi mbetleyemu akali tondolo, abana bonse ba bantu basendamo tulo. Nangwi mfifi ya bushiku yali pano pa nshi, uyo waiso lubuto abo mupusushi.
Kuli Meri afyalilwe Yesu Kristu, ‘Mfumu; na bangeli baloleshe, balinda ku mulu, mwe ntanda shonse sha mulu shimikileniko, lulumbi lube kwa lesa, mutende mu calo.
We mwana wa mushilo, we wa mu mbetleyemu, wise wikale muli fwe, ufumyo lubembu. Twaumfwo lwimbo ku mulu lwe landwe lisuma; wise kuli fwe e katula.

hymns.title: In the field with their flocks
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 34. In the field with their flocks
verses: Mu mpanga ni bakacema balele ubushiku, fitekwa na fyo pamo mwi samba lya mulu. Ilyo lubuto lwine lwaisabaponena, mungeli ainamine pa kwimbe fya luse; cake cabalilapo, e lwimbo lushakapwe. ‘’ku mulu lulumbi lube, mutende pano nse.
Kuli mwe nafyalwe lelo mupusushi mu mushi’’ e lyamoneke bumba ilya balesosa, babilile lya kale, ku mulu takulaumfwa ilya kuba nge li; baleimbile caka, mu lwimbo lushkapwe.
Bakacema balishile no kutambo mwano yu, bapapile, batota, na nyina temenwe. Baima, babwelele ku milimo ku mwabo, mu nshila bashimikile ‘’katula afyalwa’’; baimbe fya bangeli mu lwimbo lushakapwe.

hymns.title: All this night
verses: Baleimbo bushiku, abangeli ku mulu; umfweni shiwi ili; mwe bantunse imeni; ubulanda bube nseko; nakatala kasuba, mu bushiku kabala.
Shi shibuka we calo! Nakuletela nseko! Shi shibuka! Ku mulu nakubuto bushiku.
Baletamba ca kupapa. Abangeli na bantu balumbanye fya mulu.
Twacelela kasuba, muno calo katumwa; kabalike pali’fwe mu mitima yesu pe. Pantu cine ni’mwe bene muntu kabili lesa, mwe lubuto, mwaisa.

hymns.title: Good Christian men rejoice
verses: Mwe bena kristu mwange, ne mitima na mashiwi, mumfwe ne fyo twala; ‘landwe,
Yesu kristu nafyalwa mwi tanga lya fitekwa, ni mu mukondo abikwa, ali afyalwa,
Mwe bena kristu mwange, ne mitima tanga bna mashiwi, muleumfwe fya nseko; nseko! Yesu acifyalilwa kutwiswila ku mulu, Abantu bakalashuka, ali afyalwa.
Mwe bena kristu mwange, ne mitima na mashiwi; nomba mwilatina mfwa: Mweo!
Alya fyalwa katula, aletwita fwe bonse, tusumine landwe lyakwe, ali afyalwa.

hymns.title: See in yonder manger
verses: Moneni mu mulimba! Kana katufyalilwa; kalailwe kale fye, katupusushe bonse
Ubushiku bwapalwa! Bwaco bwa cilubula: Kristu Yesu imfumu Afyalwa mu Betlemu.
E mwali mu mulimba, uwabumbile ntanda; e mfumu yacindama, e waisatuwamya.
Soseni, mwe bacemi, muli na mashiwi nshi? Cinshi mwashile mpanga, no kwisa fye kwi tanga?
‘’Ubushiku tumwene ulubuto lwa nkombe, shileimbile Mfumu yafyalwa mu Betlemu’’
Mwana leso washila, ukutemwa kwakula! Mwafumine ku mwenu ku kutula fwe bantu.
Mufundishe ni ifwe, tupalane na imwe; tube fwe baicefya, bal use, abafuka.

hymns.title: Thou didst leave thy throne
verses: Mwasho bufumu ku mwenu ku mulu, pa kwishila ine pano; na ku betlemu takwali ne ng’anda ya kuti muyefyalwamo. Mwise mu mutima, mfumu, e mo mube pe mu mwenu.
Nkombe shashila shalimwimbile, shacindike mwe katula; lelo mwafyelwe ngo mupina wa fye, mu bulanda mwalecula. Mwise mu mutima, Mfumu, e no mube pe mu mwenu.
Nama sha calo, tuni twa mulu, fyakwete apa kwikala; na kristu yesu, mwana Lesa mukulu, takwete nangu ni ng’anda. Mwise mu mutima, mfumu, e mo mube pe mu mwenu.
Aisatwebe landwe lisuma lya kulubula ababi; abamupata bamufwika ne myunga, bamutanika pa muti. Mwise mu mutima, Mfumu, ine ku muti natemwa.
Na pa kubwela mu bukankala, n mulu wamucindika, e lyo munjite, na ine nyingile uko kwaba pa kwikala. Nkayanga pe, mfumu yesu, nga mwantwale fi ku mwesu.

hymns.title: Joy to the world!
verses: Owe, nseko! Imfumwi yi, natumusengele; abantu bamutotele, ba pano nse bembe
Owe, nseko! Mupusushi, abantu bembile; ifintu fyonse fya mweo fisanswilisheko.
Owe, nseko! Aleteka ne cine, cikulu; abena fyalo beshibe ukutemwa kwakwe.

hymns.title: Hark! The glad sound
verses: Umfweni baleaula, katula aisa; mitima yonse imbile kumupokelela.
Aisakalula babi, bakakwa ne ciwa; fikakilo aputula, na fyonse fya fyela.
Aisafuma ku mulu, kubomba mu calo; na pa menso ya shampofu abiko lubuto.
Aisondapa balaswa, bali no bulanda; no bupe bwakwe cikuku, apela bapina.
Hosanna shesu, mwe mfumu, shilemucelela; ne nyimbo shine sha mulu shilemuimbila.

hymns.title: O sing of Bethlehem
verses: Fya mbetleyemu twimbile, na balecemako, ne landwe ilyafumine ku bangeli uko. Lubuto lwa mbetleyemu nomba luli konse, lwa kufyalwa kwa kwa Yesu, Bangeli bemba pe.
Fya nasaleti twimbile, ne nshiku sha nseko, umwaikele na nyina umwaice yesu. Ku nasaleti akula, abo wa mutembo, ishina lyalilumbwike mulandu wa luse.
Fya ngalile natwimbile, cimana no mwela, no waendele pa menshi, ayatalike. Nelyo ifibi fya pano fyaba nga mabimbi, mu  maka yakwe twansheko no kubo mutende.
Fya kalbale natwimbile, ne fyacitilweko, na uyo uwataniweko, na uyo uwatanikwe pa cimuti uko. Pantu atufwilileko, no yo waimine ni katula, mfumu, kristu, mupusushi wine.

hymns.title: Who is He?
verses: N’ani ulya mwi tanga bantu baletotela?
Ni mfumu, landwe lisuma, Mfumu mwine wa lulumbi; tumuwile pa nkasa, Bonse bamutotele.
N’ani ulya acula, ali eka mu mpanga?
N’ani ulya batemwa, wa mashiwi ya luse?
N’ani ulya ondapa Balwele na bacula?
N’ani ulya mu mfifi apepa kuli wishi?
N’ani ulya ku muti, watufwila fwe babi?
N’ani ulya mu nshishi, nafuma? Mupusushi!
N’ani wa pa cipuna, calo conse ateke?

hymns.title: Man of sorrows
verses: Wa kucula! E shina lya mwana wa kwa Lesa; Alubwilya babipa, Aleluya, mupusushi!
Bantu bamusoweke, amfwilile ne mubi, mulopa wansumine, aleluya, mupusushi!
Twabipilwa, twabipa, wene e wa kaele. Cine, apwo kutula, aleluya, mupusushi!
Asamikwe ku kufwa, akutile: ‘’Naipwa.” Mu mulu nomba fika, aleluya, Mupusushi!
Ikese Mfumu Yesu, Kututwala ku mwesu, Tukembila mu mulu, aleluya, musushi!

hymns.title: Not all the Blood
verses: Milopa ya nama ishipaiwa pe, Te’ti itupyo mutende, Te’ti itusambe.
Shikulu e mpanga yamfumishe fibi, e lambo ilyacilisha yonse aya kale.
Mbike minwe yandi na pa mutwe wenu; kanjimininyo mufuke kuti njebelele.
Namona pa numa fibi mwansendele, ni pa muti mwatanikwe, e ko mwamfwilile.
Mu kwitaba twanga, pantu twapusuka kapanga, tulelumbanya kapanga tulemuimbila.

hymns.title: Alas! And did my Saviour
verses: Cine Yesu anculile, Mfumu yamfwilile; Mutwe wakwe wandashilwe ine muntu muntu mubi.
Ni pa mpulumushi shandi atekele kale; ku lupanda kwamoneke ubwingi bwa luse.
Lintu kristu shakapanga afwililya bantu, kasuba takamoneke, takabalike yo.
Filamba fyandi fyacepa ubupe takamoneke, takabalika ‘yo.
Filamba fyandi fyacepa ubupe ku mfumu; kuli imwe ndeipela, e co ndecita fye.

hymns.title: There is a green Hill
verses: Kulya mulundu kutali kun se ya musumba, kuntu Yeswa tufwilile ‘kuti tupusuke.
Tatwishibe ubulanda, te kuti tulande, lelo ifwe twasumina Ni’ fwe aculile.
Afwilyo kuti twelelwe, kuti tupusuke, kuti tupelwe ubumi, tutwalwe ku mulu.
Tapali muntu umbi ‘yowa kutulubula; Yesu eka e wa maka kutwiswilo mulu.
E yesu atutemwisha, fwe tumutemwishe, tucetekele mfwa yakwe, tumutumikile.

hymns.title: When I survey
verses: Pa kulolesha lupanda ukwe mfumu yamfwilile, fyuma fyandi kanshi fya fye, ne cilumba na co capwa.
Te’ ti ntakishishe kumbi kano mu mfwa ya kwa yesu; fyonse fya fye fyo natemwa ndeposa pa mulopo yu.
Ku nkasa, maboko, mutwe, umulopa ulesuma; mwabo bulanda no luse fishabala fimoneka.
Ifyalo fyonse nga fyandi, kuti mulambo wacepa; luse ulu lulefwaya mutima wandi no mweo.

hymns.title: Hail thou once despised Jesus
verses: Tune: Hyfrydol
Yesu, balimusulile, Mfumu yak u Ngalile, Mwaculile tupusuke, ni’ mwe mwatulubwile, mwe katula wa bucushi, mwasende nsoni shesu, muli imwe twalishuka, muli mwe twalishuka, shina lyenu lya mweo.
E lambo Lesa lisonta fibi fyesu kusenda. Luse e lwamutumine wa kutuwikishanya. Bantu benu baelelwa mulandu wa mulopa, icipata caisulwa kuti bonse bengile.
Yesu muli mu lulumbi ukwikalilila pe; abangeli bamutasha ku ciouna kwa shinwe. Uko muletupepela tukasukya tufika.
Mucinshu, lulumbya, maka, fyafulisha tupelo; amalumbo yashakapwe twawaminwo kuleta. Muletwafwa, mwe bangeli, ne nyimbo shawamisha; twimbile umupusushi, tulumbanye manyule.

hymns.title: Jesus, keep me near
verses: Yesu ni ku Kalbale Ndefwayo kwikala, kuti njishibe fyonse ifya luse lwenu.
Kalbale, kalbale, e ku mutima wandi, ine nsangweko pe, e ku mwoe wandi.
E ko atula babi, bamonako bumi; e ko balesekela, no bumi bapelwa.
Pa kwisa kwa kwa kristu e ko tukasangwa, na mu mulu mwa Lesa kalbale tukemba.
UKWIMA KWAKWE

hymns.title: The day of resurrection
verses: Bututuko ubu! Sabankanyeni mwe; e paska lya Buseko, paska lya kwa lesa. Atufumishe ku mfwa, kunina ku mulu, kristu weswa tufisha ne nyimbo sha mweo.
Tufumye fibi fyesu, katumone bwino, imfumu ya lulumbi no lubuto lwa pe; no kumfwe shiwi lyakwe, lya luse, lya maka, atusosho mutende, twimbyo lwimbo ulu.
Mwe ba mu mulwi mbeni, na bonse mu calo, ulwimbo lwa batulwa, ku mfumu ya mweo; ifintu fyakwe fyonse fisansha mashiwi, pantu kristu alima tube ne nseko pe.

hymns.title: Christ the lord
verses: Krisitu naime lelo, aleluya, bangeli, bantu basosa, aleluay. Imbeni nyimbo shenu, aleluya, ba mu calwa ba mu mulu, aleluya.
Napwe milimo ya luse pa bantu, bapusushiwe, nalwila bantu bonse, nansha fyonse fya mu buta.
Libwe lya pa mwinshi pene, alifumishepo eka, te’ti mfwa ituleshe, naisule mpaladise.
Naikale mfumu yesu, we mfwa ni kwi maka yobe? Afwile atutule; cilindi te’ti citwanshe.
Nomba yesu tumukonke, aletungulula ifwe; kuli wene twabumbwa, na wene e ukatwimya.
Celeleni mfumu yesu, ya mu calo, ya mu mulu; twacelela mwe kansha, ni imwe bututubuko.

hymns.title: Jesus lives!
verses: Yesu aliimine, imfwate’ti itutinye, e mo naishibila yesu akamfumya mu amfwa. Aleluya.
Yesu aliimine, pa cipuna naikala; nalakonko ko ali, pamo nankwe ku kwikala. Aleluya.
Yesu aliimine, uyo winyo wamfwilile; nakulamubombela, no kumulumbanya pe pe. Aleluya.
Yesu aliimine, nangu mweo nangu ni mfwa te’ti fitupatule ku kutemwa kwa kwa lesa aleluya.
Yesu aliimine, te’ti ntine nlyo kamo; imfwanomba emwinshi wa kwingilila ku mweo. Aleluya.

hymns.title: Low in the Grave He lay
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 53. Low in the Grave He lay
verses: Mu nshishi alele, Yesu katula, kulindilo kuca, mfumu yandi.
Mu nshishi alima, ayanshisha balwani bonse, alima katula ‘kututulako, nomba pa cipuna aba na lesa; alima, alima, aleluya, alima.
Kwa fye balindile, yesu katula, kwa fye bafungile mfumu yandi.
Mfwa tayamwikete, yesu katula; wene ayanshishe, mfumu yandi.
Mfwa tayamwikete, yesu katula; wene ayanshishe, mfumu yandi.

hymns.title: Aleluya! Aleluya!
verses: Aleluya! Aleluya! Twayawila ku mulu; imbileni kuli lesa, imbileni ne nseko. Uwafwile ku lupanda, alubwilya ba pano; yesu mfumu ya lulumbi alimine ku bafwa.
Alelayu! Aleluya! Aliimine kristu; e cisabo ica ntanshi ca fyonse fya kusabwa. Elya bena mwakwe bonse bakemiwe fyo fine, bakalonganikwa bonse kumo nankwe pen na pe.
Aleluya! Aleluya! Ululumbi ku mulu; twaimbilo mupusushi, uwayansho bwanshisho . aleluya kuli lesa, aleluya ku mwana, aleluya ku mupashi, aleluya pen na pe.

hymns.title: Jesus is risen
verses: Owe! Ukwima kulipo, Buseko, mutende; owe, ilibwe tapali, ininga ili fye.
Yesu alime fyasosa, alima mu mfwa ye lindi, sekela, imbila ukwima, yesu alimo mupusushi.
He, he! Insalusha mufwe, nashifungwa bwino; He, he! Ininga ili fye, yesu e talimo.
Yangu! Aenda pano nse, nomba talecula; yangu! Ululumbi lwakwe, konse lwalumbuka.
Mona! Kulipo ukwima, ne nyimbo ne shiwi; mona! Ukwansha kwa mfumu kwa mfumu kwaleta ubupe.

hymns.title: The strife is O’er
verses: Alelayu! Aleluya! Aleluya!
Kulwa kwapwa no kucula, mpalume yesu yalyansha, no lwa kucimfya lwaimbwa; aleluya!
Amaka ya mfwa yafilwa, pantu kristu ayonaula, natwimbe sha kutotela. Aleluya!
Nshiku shitatu shapita, aimo mumi ku bafwa, alumbwe ku ciyayaya. Aleluya!
Afune fyela fya ku mbo, aponya yonse milando, embilwe pe ne sho nyimbo. Aleluya!
Mwe mfumu mwaliculishe, ku mfwa mwalitufumishe, natwikale tumwimbile. Aleluya!

hymns.title: The head that once was crowned
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 57. The head that once was crowned
verses: Uwafwikilwe imunga, nomba alumbuka, citebo cakwe cisuma nacimusamika,
Cifulo cakwe ku mulu cili cakwe ceka, mfumu ya shamfumu shonse, lubuto ulwa pe.
Buseko bwa ba mu mulu, pamo na ba pa nshi. Abasokolwelwo luse lwakwe lukalamba.
E bo bapelwo lupanda balusende nomba; lilya bakakwete shina no Buseko bwa pe.
Baculile mfumu pa nshi. Ku mulu bateka; e bo bapelwo kwishiba kutemwa kwakwe pe.
Lupanda kuli fwe bumi, ni mfwa kuli yesu, bucetekelo bwa bantu, landwe lyabo lya pe.

hymns.title: Welcome Happy morning
verses: Ulucelo twasengela lusuma, ku mbo kwalyanshiwa, mulu wanonkwa. Ye umufwe mumi! Lesa pe na pe, wene e Kalenga wafintu fyonse. Ulucelo twasengela lusuma.
Calo ca Buseko, cafwikwa bwino, fintu filebwela pamo ne mfumu, maluba ku nika, miti yalemba, filetwebe fyo bulanda nabupwa. Ku mbo kwalyanshiwa, mulu wanonkwa.
Imyeshi ipita ne nshiku pamo, no tushita tumwimbila no lwimbo, kubuta ‘po bwaca, no kwa kasuba kwandulule mfifi, kumutotela. Ulucelo twasengela lusuma.
Mwe kalubula, Kalenga wa mweo, mwamone fyabipa ifya mu fyalo. Bulesa ni mwe, no mwana wa cine, mwafwelepo buntu kuti butulwe. Ku mbo kwalyanshiwa, mulu wanonkwa.
Mwe ntulo ya mweo, imwe mwafwile, mwali mu mfifi kuti tutulwe. Iseni ba cine, nomba imeni, bwa citatu ukufuma mu nshishi. Ulucelo twasengela lusuma.
Funguleni abakakwa ne ciwa, bonse abawile mwimye, katula, inuneni mpumi, ndupwa shimone, muletyo lubuto, lutubutishe. Ku mbo kwaliyanshiwa, mulu wanonkwa.
IMILIMO YAKWE

hymns.title: All glory and honour
verses: Lulumbi no mucinshi fibe kuli imwe, mwe baumfwilyo lwimbo lwa bana banono. Ni’mwe mwana Dabidi, mfumu ya Israel; mwi shina lya kwa lesa e mo mwaishila.
Ibumba lya bangeli balemulumbanya. Na bantu ba pano nse basuka “hosanna” aba Hebere kale balimusefeshe; ne fwe twamulumbanya, twapepa kuli mwe.
Ilyo tamulacula balimulumbenye; nomba mwaimishiwa twacite fyo fine. Na imwe mwapokele malumbanyo yabo; na nomba kuli ifwe pokenya mapepo.
Lulumbi no mucinshi fibe kuli imwe, mwe baumfwilyo lwimbo lwa bana banono. Amen.

hymns.title: The son God
verses: Ni mwana lesa aleya ku kulwa ne ciwa; uluunga lulepupa, N’ani ulekonka? Winganwako ulukombo lwa kuculacula? Untu asendo lupanda wene alekonka.
Impuka ya bwa basalwa, Bali no mupashi, baishibe shikulwibo, tabali no mwenso. Bakumenye umulwani, no kwanshe fyabipa; kufika ku mfwa balelwa; N’ani ulekonka?
Abaume na baice nabafwikwa tutu, bamayo na bakashana, baanga kwa yesu. Balenina ulupili lwa kuculacula; mwe Lesa, ifwe tukonke mu mulongo wabo.

hymns.title: When all thy mercies
verses: Lintu nakutumana mu bupalo bwenu, fyansekesha pakalamba, nafilwo kutasha.
Ilyo nail umwaice mu nshile shayafya, mwalengafwilisha lyonse, nangwi lyo nshishibe.
Ilyo nalwelyo bulwele e lyo mwamposeshe; ilintu namubifishe, mwalinjelele fye.
Pa makana na makana ya bupe natota; nabupoka no kutasha, nakulatotela.
Mu nshita shonse sha mweo, nakulamukonka;  na kulya kwine ku mwenu nkalamulumbanya.
Mu nshita sha ciyayaya, nkalamuimbile; awe nshita yacepa ya kumulumbanisha.

hymns.title: Tune; St. Catherine
verses: He sendeth sun
Mfula na kasuba fyonse fyafwaikwa ku maluba; ni’fyo lesa atukusha ku Buseko no bulanda.
Muli fyonse fimponena, kufwaya kwenu kucitwe.
Bushe abana ban’w……. bafyashi abo bat……… ni’fyo tata, mul…. Umwana wacetel
Nomba te’ti nwinwintike mulandu wa fya pano nse; mu cinshingwa ca mfwa na mo mwimbile ncili ndepema.

hymns.title: For the beauty of the earth
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 63. For the beauty of the earth
verses: Pa busuma bwa calo, pa busuma bwa mulu, pa mulandu wa luse ululi konse konse;
Shifwe kuli’mwe lelo twimbyo lwimbo lwa nseko
Pa busuma bwa nshita bwa nshita sha bushiku, kasuba, bwa mpili na manika, bwa miti na maluba:
Pa bupe bwa kutemwa kwa bafyashi na bana, fibusa fya pano nse ifitwafwa mu luse;
Pa mulandu wa bupe mutupela pano nse, fyonse ifituntulu, nga maluba ya mulu:
Pa cilonganinwe ci, icipepa kuli’mwe, cili mu fyalo fyonse, cakulamutsha pe:

hymns.title: No Title
verses: Ilyo aima maba; alelayu! Shikulu Lesa eka ateka; Aleluya! Ishiwi liye lifike konse.
Aleluya! Umfweni umulu na pano nse fyasukana mu lwimbo lwa nafungo lunga, nasomeko lupanga, nomba ‘pelo bufumu bonse ku  mwana wakwe.
Wene akulateka konse konse pano nse; na lyo line kuteka nelyo mulu wapita; na ku mpelelekesho umulwani akawa. Aleluya! Kristu umo na Lesa wishi.

hymns.title: The church’s one foundation
verses: Cilonganino caba pali yesu kristu, cabe cilengo cipya ce shiwi na menshi; aishilecifwaya ukuba nabwinga, cashitwa no mulopa, alicifwilile.
Baitwa bena fyalo ku kufyalwa cipya, bucetekelo bumo ne mfumu imo fye; ne mfumu imo fye; citashe shina limo, cilyo cimo cilia, ubusubilo bumo e bo cakwatisha.
Mu kukakala konse, pamo na mu bulwi, cilindilo mutende uwa ciyayaya; lintu ifya lulumb fikesamoneka, e lyo cilonganino cikalatushisha.
Calundana pano nse na lesa patatu, cilomfwana na balya abaletusho ko. Angeni, mwe bashila! Mwe mfumu tupeni pamo na’bwa bafuka tukekale ne mwe.

hymns.title: Savior, blessed savior
verses: Mwe katula wesu shi’umfweni twimbe; na mashiwi yesu tumulumbanye.
Fyonse fyo twakwata, ne fyo tukaba, mibili, mitima, twamupa lelo.
Twali ukutali na ku lupanda, tatwasakamene nangu panono. E lyo mwaishile mu kutufwaya; mwalitubwekesha kwi cinka lilya.
Katupalamishe mupepi pepi; no kufukamisha pa kucelela. Na pa kututula mwaishilefwe; mwaile ku mulu kuti tukonke.
Ifya luse fyenu fyalifulisha; no bupanda bwenu bwabo bwa cine takuli bulanda, nelyo cikonko, uko abangeli bamwimbila pe.
Nomba akasuba kaya ku kuwa, kalebalikila pa fyo twabomba. Yaswa ipwe nshita, kucula kupwa; e lyo, mwe katula, tukayatusha.
Tuye lwa ku ntanshi mu lwendo lwesu nga bashilishwa bali kwa yesu. Kushe fya pano nse natucincile, twiceba ku numa kano tufike.

hymns.title: I heard the voice of Jesus.
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 67. I heard the voice of Jesus.
verses: Naumfwile Yesu ati; “so tushe kuli ne; laliko mutwe, we wandi, pa cifuba candi” naitebe kuli yesu, ni’ne wa bulanda, nasangapwa pa kutusha, na o ansekesha.
Naumfwile yesu ati; “mona ndekupa fye menshi ya bumi, we mwana nwa, ube no mweo” naitebe kuli yesu, amenshi nanwene, cilaka caliputwike, naba muli wene.
Naumfwile yesu ati; “ndi nyali ya calo, mona kuli ne ukuca kwa nshiku, lubuto” naitebe kuli yesu, lutanda. Kasuba, na mu lubuto ndendamo shisuke ndo shipwe,

hymns.title: “Come unto me”
verses: “Iso ko ndi, Wanaka, ndekupo butusho,” e shiwi lya kwa yesu ku bakungumana lyatwebe fya mutende, cikuku ne nseko, no luse, e na fyonse ifishapweko.
“Iso ko ndi, we mwana, ndekupo lubuto,” e shiwi lya kwa yesu, lyaisa ne nseko. Mitima yalifina, twaluba mu nshila; bushiku natulosha, bwaca twasekala.
“Iso ko ndi, we wafwa, nalakupo mweo” e shiwi lya kwa yesu, lyaisatwafwako; mulwani alikosa, ukulwa kwabipa, lelo watupa maka, ne fwe tukamwansha.
“Na uyo uleisa, Te’ti mutamfye ‘yo” e shiwi lya kwa yesu ilitamfyo mwenso. Liletwita fwe bashawamina, uluse lukalamba, tufike kuli’mwe.

hymns.title: Hail to the Lord’s Anointed
verses: ….tucelele mfumu, …… mwana wa kwa lesa; …………… ku mulu, pa calo kuteka, aisaono busha, kukakula mkole, kufumye mu cine.
Akesa nge fye mfula iloka pa calo; Buseko no kutemwa e fikamenamo. Kutangilile ntanshi mutende uleya; no bololoke bwine pa numa bwakonka.
Shikamuwile mfumu, shikaleto bupe; ndupwa shikatotela shikalamwimbila. Pantu akalateka mu fyalo ne fyalo; konse uko kapumpe engapupukila.
Bonse bakamupepa, nshiku ne nshiku pe, bufumu bukakula, te kuti bukapwe. Awe tacakaluke, cipingo cakwe ci; likalabelelela ishina lya luse.

hymns.title: Lord thy word abideth
verses: Shiwi lyaikala, litutungulula; untu asumina, Buseko apelwa.
Nga babi baliko, litupelo Buseko; litusansamusha, lilatupususha.
Lyo bulanda bwisa, na ifwe twatunkwa, lilatufundisha, litubakilila.
Uwishibe n’ani ubuseko bwe shiwi, buntu tulepelwa, fwe balesumina?
Fwe kuti twishibe fyonse litufundisha, kuti tumutemwe, no kwikala ne mwe.
Ishiwi lya luse lyafwa aba mweo; ishiwi lya mweo lyafwa abalefwa.

hymns.title: Jesus thou Joy of loving Hearts
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 71. Jesus thou Joy of loving Hearts
verses: Ni’mwe Buseko bwa bantu abatemwe shina lyenu. Mwe yesu, ntulo ya mweo, twapilibuka ku calo.
Cine cenu ca pen a pe, mutual bonsha bamwita; kubamusanga, wa luse, ku bamufwaya, musuma.
twamusonda, mwe fya kulya, twafwayo kulye nshiku pe; twanwa, mwe kufakauka, cilaka naciputuka.
Mitima yamufuluka, konse uko twaikala; twaanga nga tusekela, twatemwa nga tuli nakwe.
Mwe Yesu, mube ne fwe pe, twikale pe umutende; mutamfye mfifi ya fibi, lubuto mubengeshimye.

hymns.title: Jesus calls us
verses: Yesu mfumu aletwita muno calo cabipa, tuleumfwe shiwi lyakwe: “konka ine nshiku pe”
Yesu kristu aletwita, Nelyo tuletotela fintu fya fye fya mu calo: “ulentemwo kucila.”
Mu Buseko, mu bulanda, mu kutusha, mu ncito, Nshiku shonse aletwita: mwana wandi untemwe”
Aletwita muli fyonse: mwe mfumu natumfwisha; twasumina mu mitima kumutemwo kucila.

hymns.title: Rock of ages
verses: Mwe chilibwe ca kale ……….kamfisame muli’mwe………umulapa na menshi ………. Fyansumine kuli’mwe, e kundapwa kwa fibi, nsangululwe, mutule.
Nelyo kamo nshikwete, lupanda njikata fye; mumfwike ndi no bwamba, ngafwa ne mbulwa maka. Nomba njise, nimbipa, munsambe nikesafwa.
Milimo yak u minwe, te’ti’citya mafunde; mukosha nga taupwa, filamba filepona; Te’ti ifi fintule, muntule mweka imwe.
Lintu nkaleko mweo, yakashibata menso; Nkamono ko mwikele pa cipuna ca cilye. Mwe cilibwe ca kale, kamfisame muli’mwe.

hymns.title: There’s not a friend
verses: Takuli kafwa nga yesu kristu, takuli, nakalya, takuli umbi wingatutula, takuli, nakalya.
Yesu atwishiba fwe bonse, akatufisha kwi shilya, takuli kafwa nga yesu kristu, takuli, nakalya.
Takuli wa mushilo nga yesu, no bufuke bwa kucila ngo bu.
Tapali nshita ashiba ne fwe, nangwa kasuba nangu nushiku.
Ni nshita nshi alulilya bakwe? Nangu kutamfyo mupulumushi?
Bushe kulyu bupe bumbi ngo bu?
N’ani afwilyo kukana yesu?
UBUTEKO BWAKWE

hymns.title: Jesus shall reign
verses: Yesu wene akateka konsha kasuba katula; bufumu te’ti bukapwe mweshi usuke ukapwe.
Bakalamulumbanya pe; shina lyakwe lyatemwikwa, pa bushiku na kasuba.
Abantu ba ndimi shonse bamutemwe, bamwimbile; na mu mapepwa banono bakalalombo bupalo.
Abatekwa bakashuka, abafungwa bafungulwa, abanaka bakatusha, aba nsala bakekuta.
Mulete bonse, mwe bantu, mucinshu, luse ku mfumu; bangeli beke no lwimbo, pamo nab a muno calo.

hymns.title: The lord’s our rock
verses: Mfumu yesu e cilibwe mwa kufisama ku nkunta; twashuka nangu ni mu mfwa,mwa kufisama ku nkunta.
Ni yesu e cilibwe muno lwendo nga twanaka, nga twanaka. Ni yesu e cilibwe muno lwendo, mwa kufisama ku nkunta.
Cubwa kasuba, bushiku, te’ti tutinya balwani
Nge fipupu fyatwimina, twakanafumo mo twaba.
Mwe cilibwe, mupusushi, mutwafwe nshiku shonse pe.

hymns.title: One there is above all others
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 77. One there is above all others
verses: Yesu atutemwa bonse, atemwa pe. Nshiku shonse aba ne few, atemwa pe. Yesu atutungulula, na mu nshila tukaluba nga tatulepalamina. Atemwa pe.
Yesu atupelo bumi, atemwa pe. Mu mitima twamutemwa, …………………………………………………………………..
Alisende mpulumushi, atemwa pe. Akatutwala ku mulu, atemwa pe. Akalatwafwa na maka, atucincintilile mfwa na balwanya ba mu nshila.atemwa pe.

hymns.title: O Jesus ever present
verses: Yesu pe fye mwabapo, kacema musuma; shina lyenu lyabila mu mitima yesu.
Twatemwenwe shina li lyo twalya baice; mu bukalamba pamo e Cuma tukwete.
Lingi ku bonaushi nga twafikileko, amubulaba ne fwe, mwe katula wesu.
Ilingi na mu mfifi, nga twaliwilemo, lelo mwalitwimishe, e, mwatuposeshe.
Mwe kacema musuma, twamucetekela; ni mwe mulatulisha, mutwimya nga twawa.
Shiwi lyenu lya maka mu mfwa tukalyumfwa; mukatufishe bonse kwi cinka ku mwenu.

hymns.title: O God of Bethel
verses: Mwe Lesa wa ku betele, mwe batulisha pe, ni’mwe mwaletungulula bantu benu kale.
Natufukama kuli’mwe no kumupapata; mwe lesawa kwa Abramu, mube lesa wesu.
Mu nshiku shenu shonse fye tutungululeni; mukaletupele filyo, ne fifwalo fyesu.
Mutubake, twapapata, shisuke ndo shipwe; kabinge mulya mwa shifwe tukabelelela.
Ubu bupalo twalomba, e bo twafwaisha, mube lesa wesu nomba, Cuma cesu ca pe.

hymns.title: Begone unbelief
verses: We fibi fuma, katula lipo. Takakole ukwisantula. Ine ndepepa fye, wenfya langafwa, nga tuli na kristu nasule nkunta.
Ilyo pafita e cilongoshi; candi kukonka, cakwe kumbaka. Nga takuli menshi, bantu bandula, shiwi asosele akalifisha.
Luse lwa kale e cishibilo, te’ti andeke kutotobela. Ifya ebenesa ninjibukisha, finengo kwishiba akulangafwa.
Te kuti nwinte ifimponena, ifya kwafye fi anjeba kale. Bonsha bakamona ubupususho, mu malanda yengi bakonke mfumu.
Fya mu lukombo ifyo anwene, fya kuluba mwe! Te’ti tulande. Inshila yayafyaumwa twendele! Wene alecula, bushe ifwe’yo?
Fyonse nkumanya filemombela; kanshi’fyalula fyabe nshita ino filatucusha, lelo nga twayansha tukalateka.

hymns.title: Come thou fount
verses: Yesu kale amfwaile, nalyu mweni kutali; pa kuntula aposele mweo wakwe pali’ne
Namutemwa, aleluya, namutemwa’ mupusushi, namutemwa yesu kristu, amfwilile pa kalbale.
Yesu nomba alefwaya kuti nkonke nshiku pe mu makasa yakwo mwine mwaendele pano nse.
Yesu mwine akabwela kututwala ku mwakwe; e mo tukalasekela mu musumba wakwe pe.

hymns.title: Who come down from heaven
verses: Afumine ku mulu, yesu mupusushi, aishile ngo muntu, yesu mupusushi.
Imbeni ulwimbo lu, ebeni bonsha bantu, afumine ku mulu, yesu mupusushi.
Afwilile pa muti, ku kutula na ine.
Mu mulu abe mfumu, tunakile, tutemwe.
Ku mulu akekila, kututwala ku mwakwe.

hymns.title: The great physician
verses: Shig’amga ali mupepi, shina lya kwa yesu, shina ili lyacila, yesu, mufumu yesu.
Bula ulwimbo lusuma, lwe shina lya kwa yesu, shina ili lyacila, yesu, mfumu yesu.
Impulumushi shelelwa pe shina lya kwa yesu; enda mu nshila ku mulu kwikala pen a yesu.
Lyafumye fibi no mwenso, ishina lya kwa yesu; natemwe shina lya mfumu, natemwe mfumu yesu.
Twimbe bonse tulumbanye ishina lya kwa yesu; tusumine landwe lyakwe, landwe lya bupususho.
Lyo tukafika ku mulu tukamumona yesu. Tukamwimbilo lwimbo ku lwe shina lya kwa yesu.

hymns.title: Sing a Hymn to Jesus
verses: Imbileni yesu nga mwasusuka; muleeba yesu bulanda bwenu. Nga yayafye ncito, nshila yalepa, nga mwatina cimo, mwebe mu kwimba. Mutimo fuluka ngala ya mweo; isansamusheni pa kwimbo lwimbo
Tuli ba pano nse, mwe ba ku mulu, ifwe tuli babi, mwabuta tutu. Tuli ba kwaluka, tamwaluka yo, Buseko bufuma mwi shina lyenu. Imbileni yesu, nga mwasusuka; muleeba yesu bulanda bwenu.
Intulo ni yesu ya fintu fyonse, na bulesa bonse bwaikalamo. Ndenina ukwali, pa kumulumba; no bushiku bwandi bwaca no kuca, nyimba kuli yesu, nga nasusuka, e fyo njeba yesu bulanda bwandi.
Yesu ndefwaisha kumutemwa pe, bushe ndete shani bupe kuli’mwe? E nalimutemwa, mwise muli’ne, e lyo mukansende kuba na imwe. Nyimba kuli yesu, nga nasusuka, e fyo njeba yesu bulanda bwandi.
LESA UMUPASHI

hymns.title: Come holy ghost
verses: Mwise mwe mupashi, mwise, tumfwa maka yenu, intulo ya fintu fyonse, ya luse, lubuto.
Mwe mupashi, muli imwe nkombe cine ca mwine ca mwi buku ili.
Mwe mupashi wa ku mulu, tufukatileni, muwamye mitima yesu, lubuto lwingile.
Mwe lesa twalamwishiba nga Mwaba muli few, mu calo twakulaumfwa amaka no luse.

hymns.title: Our blest redeemer
verses: Lintu yeswa shalikepo abasambi bakwe, kasansamusha apele kuba ne fwa.
Aishiletusangula, tube ba cikuku; afwayafwaye mitima mwa kwikala.
E shiwi lyakwe twaumfwa, liletepelesha, lyaleshe fibi fyakwe.
Mwe mupashi uwa bupe, mube pali ifwe, mwikale muli’few benu mu mitima.

hymns.title: Lord God the holy ghost
verses: Mwe lesa mupashi, mu nshite yi ine, pamo nga pali pentekost, mwingile na maka.
Twalongana kuno, mu cifulo cenu, kulindililo bulayo, mupashi wa luse.
Mwise nge cipupu, mututenshe bonse, tube no mutima umo, mu bufwayo bwenu.
Mukosha baice, na bakote pamo bapelwe ndimi shanguka sha kumutotela
Mupashi lubuto, mufumye imfifi, mubengeshime pali few, bukaco busuma.
Mupashi wa cine, mube ntungulushi, mu mweo nangu ni mu mfwa, tusuke tufike.

hymns.title: Spirit divine
verses: Mwe mupashi muletwafwa, muno ng’anda yenu, mwike no luse, na maka, mwise mwe mupashi.
Mwise nge fintu lubuto lutusokolola. Tutungululwe mu nshila ya baololoka.
Mwise  ngo mulilo, koco bubi bwa mitima, kuti twitulyo mulambo kuli kalubula.
Mwise ngo mumyo kupala nshita ya mapepo, ne ciswebebe cikabe bala lya mufundo.
Mwise kuno nge cipele. Muletyo mutende, cilonganino mu calo cibe nge ca mulu.
Mwise kuno nge cipupu, bupe bwa pentekost; e lyo bamone mu calo ulumbi lwenu.
Mwe mupashi sanguleni calo cibe cenu; mwike na maka ya luse, mwise mwe mupashi.

hymns.title: Holy spirit dwell with me
verses: Mwe mupashi wa luse, leka mbe wa luse ne na mashiwi ya kwafwa muli ne yamoneke; no kushipa ne congwe kansose fya kwa kristu.
Mwe mupashi wa cine, leka mbe wa cine ne mbe na mano yafula, ya kumulumbanisha; ne micitile yandi kuti imubombele.
Mwe mupashi mufuke, kamyo mufuke ine; kanjisalyo mutima ilyo esa katunka; no kwisula pa numa, kuti mubalikemo.
Mwe mupashi tondolo, tontolo kanjikale; fintwi cani cakula, ku mushili catula; ngo lubutwa kacelo ulufumya impepo.
Mwe mupashi wa maka, aya yene ndefwaya; kuti nkose nshiku pe, te ku maka yandi fye; ubucetekelo bu bukamfisha ku mulu.
Mwe mupashi wabuta, ine kamupashanye. Mumpatule ku fibi, nsale fisuma fyeka; mungafwe kuti mpele fyandi fyonse kuli’mwe.

hymns.title: Come to our poor nature’s light
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 90. Come to our poor nature’s light
verses: Mwise, tuli shampofu, tupelwe ulubuto, mupashi wa ku mulu, kasansamusha.
Tuli babi, tusambwe; twalwala, mutuposhe; twaluba, tulondolwe; kasansamusha.
Twashiwa ababusu, tupelwe fya ku mulu, luse, nsekwe, cikuku, kasansamusha.
Umutende ngo mume, wise utunashe few, fya kwa krisu tulangwe, kukabilisha kwesu, kasansamusha.
Twishibe bwino shifwe, mu mitima tumfwishe ifyo twasangululwa, kasansamusha.
Tutwalwe kuli lesa mu nshila yawamisha, ku mulu tukafika, kasansamusha.

hymns.title: O spirit of living God
verses: Mwe mupashi wa kwa lesa, mu bwingi bwa bupe bwenu, konse ukwa bantu benda mwikile playa baluba.
Peleni ndimi sham aka sha kusose shiwi lyenu, no bupalo kwe landwe lyumfwikwa.
Mfifi’sangukyo lubuto, no bulwi bubyo mutende, bafilwa mubapya maka, no luse lwansho bukali.
Mwe mupashi, balungikwe bantu bonse kuli lesa; umweo mubapemene, kuti basumine bonse.
Ulupanda lubacimfye, kabese babatishiwe, shina lyakwe lilumbulwe; abantu balitotele.
Lesa shiwe alefwaya bantu bonse bapusuke; kutemwa kwakwe kucitwe kuti yesu abe mfumu.

hymns.title: O spread the tidings round
verses: Bileni shiwi’li ukwasangwa babi, ukuli mitima iyacule cibi, we mwina kristu we, ima ulande fi; waiso mupashi.
Mwaiso mupashi, waiso mupashi, wafuma ku mulu, ca bupe cikulu; bileni mwe bonse ku nko sha pano nse: waiso mupashi
Inkunta ikali, no mwela wakosa, fyonse nafipita, bushiku nabuca, pa kwiso lubuto, bupe bwa kwa lesa; waiso mupashi.
Yaise mpalume, shinganga wa cine, apo mweo upya, no butungwa bwine; nombo muntu onse ulwimbo naembe; waiso mupashi.
Uku e kutemwa ukwa mano nga nshi, kulebombe cibi mu ndupwa sha pa nshi, shimonyo busamo bulya bwa ku ntanshi; waiso mupashi.
Imbenyo lwimbo lu, bonse ba ku mulu, na imwe ba pa nshi, mwasukane nab o, lwimbo lwa kutemwa, lwimbo lwa cikuku; waiso mupashi.
UBWIKALO BWA BENA KRISTU

hymns.title: I am thine O lord
verses: Ndi wenu mfumu, nalyumfwe shiwi ilya kutemwa kwenu; lelo ndafwayo kupalako pepi  pepi kuli’mwe.
Mpalamikwe pepi mwe mfumu ulyo ko mwamfwilile, mpalamikwe pepi pepi mwe mfumu, kulyo ko mwandashilwe.
Kangobelwe mu kumubombela, mpelwa maka, cikuku; mpunamineko nobusumino, ndosho mo mufwila.
E yawame nshita napepamo, ilyo mufukamina; na ine nsoshanya ne mwe lesa fyo nsosa ne cibusa.
Kwalibo kutemwa nshingeshiba kano ninshi nkabuke; kwabakwe nseko nshingakumamo, kano ntushe na imwe.

hymns.title: I know not what awaits me
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 94. I know not what awaits me
verses: Nshishibe fya ku ntanshi, lesa’mfimbi menso; na konse mu lwendo lwandi ifipya letapo; Buseko ubo apela buli bwa bupapo.
Ukwa lentungulula, nkonka, ncetekela; mu mutende wine wine nyimba, “alishiba”
Ndemona papaleme, te fya kutali yo; ulubuto lwa ku mulu e lo nsuminamo. Shileshibantukila fye inyali sha calo.
Nelyo nshaishibisha, wene aishiba, anjikata ku kuboko, te kuti andeke. Ansansamusho mutima, pantu antemwisha.
Ifyo fine ndeenda mu mfifi fititi; cikulu nyenda na lesa, ntungulushi yandi. Te kuti nyende neka fye nangu pabutile.

hymns.title: In the cross of Christ: I glory
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 95. In the cross of Christ: I glory
verses: Mu lupanda nsekeleal, lwaimikwe na kale; ulubuto ulwe landwe lucilipo pen a pe.
Ngo bulanda buleisa, ne fya kunsakamika, mu lupanda mufumamo umutende ne nseko.
Nelyo fyonse fyaliwama mu nshila pano pa nshi; ku lupanda kulefuma ulubuto lwacila.
Umusamwe no bulanda fyapalwa ku lupanda; umutende e mo uli, no Buseko ubwa pe.

hymns.title: O happy band of pilgrims
verses: mwe mpuka ya balendo,muleya ku ntanshi, na yesu e munenu, kwa yesu e mutwe.
Mwapalwa nga mwabomba ifyo abombele; mwapalwa nga mwacula ifyo aculile.
Lupanda asendele, ni’mwe asendele; ingala alifwala, ni’mwe afwalile.
Fya kumwesha fyaisa, malanda mwakwata, lelwe filemutunka, imfwa ikapwisha.
Ifi fyabe fisamo fya mutengo kulu, fileba ngo mutant kunina ku mulu.
Mwe mpuka ya balendo, loleshenyu mulu; kulyu bulanda kuno, uko icilambu.

hymns.title: The lord’s my shepherd
verses: (Tune; evan, as in SSS 327)
Lesa e kacema wandi, nshakakabile pe; ku mulemfwe alentwala, ku menshi ya bumi.
Umutima ambwesesha, mu lwendo angafwa, mu nshila sha bololoke, pe shina lyakwe fye.
Lintu nkenda mu mfwa ine, nshakatine kantu, pantu imwe mulensunga, no kunsansamusha.
Cintamba mwanungikila mu sinso sa babi, umutwe wandi mwansuba, nkombo shaisula.
Busuma bweka no luse fyakulankonka pe, na mu nganda ya kwa lesa nkekalililamo.

hymns.title: Jesus, lover of my soul
verses: Yesu katemwa wandi, mabimbi ne cipupu filepano kungansha. Mumfishe mwe katula, mabimbi yapitepo, na mu lupusukilo mwingandama ku mpela.
Kafwa umbi nshikwete, kano imwe, mwe napapata, mwingansunge pe, muli katula wandi, mutwe wandi mucinge mu cintelelwe cenu.
Kristu ndemufwaisha, ni’mwe ntulo ya fyonse, maka ya bafililwa, no muti wa balwala. Shina lyenu lisuma, ine muntu wabipa, ninjisula no bubi, imwe cine, cikuku.
Luse lwenu lwafula, lwa kunsambe tutu, lumbutisho mutima. Ni’mwe ntulo ya mweo, nkanwa yengi kuli’mwe; fukauka muli;ne, mweo ushipelela.

hymns.title: One there is above
verses: Kulyu mo wacila bonse, wene ni kafwa wine, luse lwakwe e lwacila, na lo lwa munshipela; abwa bamwishibisha bamusanga musuma.
Bushe twakwate cibusa ca kutufwila bonse? Lelo yesu e wafwile ku kutuwikishanya. Te pa kutemwa cine! Yesu ni kafwa wine.
Ilyo aikele pa nshi ali kafwa wa babi; nomba alisansamikwa acili ifyo fine; abenike fibusa, acili abalela.
Tulefwaya icikuku ca kunashe mitima; pantu tulaba ilingi kafwa uyu twakwata; lelo lintu twafika tukalamutemwisha.

hymns.title: I feel like singing
verses: Ndefwayo kwimbe nshita pe, filamba fyafutwa; ndi cibusa wa kwa yesu, nalamubombela.
Ndamulumbanya, mulumbanya pe; mulumbanya, ndamulumbanya pe.
Kumumona pa lupanda, uko antanikilwe; nalilishe ifilamba, nomba mulumbanya.
Nga natunkwa na matunko, nalamwibukisha; nelyo nasakamikwako nalamulumbanya.
Ne landwe ilya kwa yesu nakulashimika; bambi babulyo lwimbo lu lwa kumulumbanya.

hymns.title: Lord Jesus I loe thee
verses: Yesu namutemwa, shikulu wandi, cibwe-camba candi, umupusushi, katula wa luse, nkamwimbila pe, e imwe mwalingo kulumbaniwa.
Namutemwa pantu mwantemwa ine, mwalinculile cibi kalbale, impumi yenu yalashilwe myunga, e imwe mwalingo kulumbaniwa.
Kuti namutemwa mu mweo, mu mfwa, kuti namutotele nshiku shonse, no kwimba ningemba ne mfwa pa menso; e imwe mwalingo kulumbaniwa.
Ilyo tukamono lulumbi lwenu, na’benu banino kuba ne mwe pe, nkapundisha mu bumpashanya bwenu: e imwe mwalingo kulumbaniwa.

hymns.title: Conquering now
verses: Ukwansha nomba yakulaansha mfumu yam aka yonse; yatungulula aba cishinka ukulwisha balwani. Balya bashipa balenda nabafwikwe fyabuta, ukupundisha ishina ilya kwa cilongoshi.
Te bam aka balensha, nelyo aba lubilo; lelo ni abwa ba cine e bakulaansha pe.
‘’ukwansha nomba akulaansha” mfumu iyi ni nani? Ne fita fyakwe ifingi nga nshi, ni kwi uko fyafuma? Ni mfumu ya lulumbi; na bantwa balemukonka bakabeka nge ntanda.
Ukwansha nomba akulaansha, yesu ateka konse; ifipuna fyonse fikapita, ubuteko bwa mwine bukabelelela pe; na ifwe mulya mu mwakwe tukalatushamo pe.

hymns.title: Midst the darkness
verses: Mu mapamfyo muno calo nkalasekela; naishiba ulucelo kristu akea. Mu lubuto no mutende uko kwa wishi, kristu alendolela, alemfuluka.
Mupashi wantungulula mu ciswebebe, lelo nomba nalamone calo kwa lesa; uko mu luse, lulumbi alenindila; shina lyandi lyalilembwa, te ti’andabe.
Uko mu nyimbo shawama, lumbi alomfwa, lushindo mu ciswebebe lulepalama. Ukwe miputule yonse aliteyanya, lelo nabwinga apelwa talafikako.
N’ani uyo aleisa ukunkokela, ngo lutanda lwa lucelo, bwaco lubuto?e ni uyo wantulile pa kuculila; mu lulumbi namwishiba, umo wine pe.
We nseko pa kumonana, kucula kwapwa! Awe ukuposha kwakwe ine nkomfwako; wene na ine kwingila pamo mu mulu, wene na ine ukuba pamo mu mwakwe.
Uko ukushili mfifi nelyo kuluba, uko ku calo kwa lesa tukasoshanya; ine ne wasangululwa kuba wakwe pe, kulumbanya icikuku cakwe kuli’ine.
Wene, uyo mu bucushi, anculile’ne, ne waesesho kukonka mu ciswebebe; ifwe pamo mu lulumbi tukasekela. Candi kuba mankwe pe fye, cakwe kumona.

hymns.title: Sweet is the work
verses: Milimo iyi yawama ya kulumbanya, kutota; kulango lusho lucelo, kulande cine cungulo.
Bushiku bwenu bwawama, bwa kupepe no kutusha, mutima wandi ulinge kupalama kuli imwe .
Nakulaansha mu mfumu, nakulashe cikuku. Milimo yakwe yawama, mashiwi nay o yasuma.
Iye cikuku cangwamya, fintu fyenu nkalabomba; no Buseko mulampela, e fyo mulansansamusha.
Mpulumushi e shilwani, tashakancushe kabili; balwani bakapwa bonse, ciwa takamfulunganye.
Lyene nkamona no kumfwa fyonse pano nafwaisha, mombe na maka na mano, mu calo cilia ca nseko.

hymns.title: Blessed be God our God.
verses: Atotelwe Lesa, uwatupele umwana wakwe, bupe pa bupe bwa kucilako. Atotelwe lesa.
Cinshi aletana? Ifyo atupele ca kucila; tatwalingile, e cikuku fye. Cinshi aletana?
Atupela mwane, ici e catufumisho mwenso, ici e catulesho bulanda, atupela mwane.
Kashinina n’ani? Ifyo kristu e watufwilile, ifyo atusosela ku mulu. Kashinana n’ani?
Lesa e kebela, n’ani ukatukala kabili? Lesa ekabela.
E bwanshisho bwesu, pantu wa maka e watwanshishe, atulwilile, atucimfishe, e bwanshisho bwesu.

hymns.title: Take the name of Jesus
verses: Bule shina lya kwa yesu, we mwana wa bulanda, likakupelo Buseko, konse kuntu ukaya.
Ishina lisuma lya pa nshi no mulu.
Sose shina lya kwa yesu, libe cishangu konse: lintu waba no kweshiwa lilumbule,  upepe.
Sunge shina lya kwa yesu, lilekupelo kwanga: mu maboko akubula, lwimbo ulembo ulemwimbila.
Temwe shina lya kwa yesu, kuwa mfumu ya shamfumu, tumutotele bonse.

hymns.title: Look away to Jesus.
verses: Kabebete yesu, we wa bulanda, alikuculile, kabiye tusha, bulanda sendele, ne membu yesu, mucetekele.
Kabebete yesu, mwina mwakwe we, lyo bulwi bwabuka, koselela fye, balwani baliko, amaka yapwa; kabebete yesu, akulabansha.
Kabebete yesu na mu milimo, butusho bukesa nshita inono. Yesu alekwita, lelo kabiye; kabebete yesu, mu nshila yakwe.
Kulya ku mabumba ya ba kwa kristu, tukalalumbanya katula wesu. E lyo mu lulumbi lwa mulu yesu  nshiku shonse pe.

hymns.title: My faith looks up to thee
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 108. My faith looks up to thee
verses: Nabebeta imwe, mwali pa kalbale, mupususha; mugumfwe mwi pepo, fibi mufumyemo, ndetendeke lelo kuba wenu.
Mumpele cikuku cafuma ku mulu, mulenkosha; pantu mwamfwilile, kuti ntemwe imwe, lelo ne nshiku pe mu mutima.
Nga nyenda mu mfifi, yaisa macushi, ntangululwe; mfifi’bya kasuba, mufumyo kucula, mundesho kufuma kuli imwe.
Ngo lwendo lwa mweo lukapwa mu calo, mukansenda. Mwe mfumu, mu luse, fibi fifumiwe, mumfisho ko muli, walubulwa.

hymns.title: O’er the Gloomy hills
verses: Ku milundu na ku mpili, we mutima tambako, amalayo ya kwa lesa yalaisa kuli’few. Aleluya, aleluya, buce, bubelelele.
Ku bufumu bwa mu mfifi mutumeko lubuto; ku kabanga, ku masamba, buce ubu bushiku; bulubulo, bulubulo, bwise butupyo mweo.
Bushiku bwalaswa buce, bwandulule imfifi; ne landwe libelelele, lishimikwe, lyanane. Konse konse, konse konse, mupepi no kutali.

hymns.title: Savior lead me
verses: Yesu nyensha, niluba, nyensha bwino mu nshila; ndi bwino nga ulipo, muli’we njikalemo.
Nyensha, nyensha, yesu nyensha, niluba; nyensha bwino mu nshila, nshiku shonse ne nshita.
Ni’we cubo kuli’ne, nga matunko yes ape; ndi fye ngo li mupepi, ncetekela muli’we.
Yesu nyensha ku mpela ya bwikalo na ku mfwa; nsuke mfike kwi shilya kulyo bulanda bwapwa.

hymns.title: O Jesus I have promised.
verses: Mwe yesu ninsumina kumutumikila; mube pepi na ine, mwe kafwa, shikulu. Te’ti ntine fyabipa, nga muli mupepi; nelyo kulubantika nga muli na ine.
Dumfwe fyo muli’pepi fya calo filipo; namone fintwi fingi, ne filentukapo, balwani nab o bali mu kati na kun se; mwe yesu mupalame, mumbake ku fibi.
Dumfwe fyo mulelanda ne shiwi lyawama, kukanaumfwe fya fye, nelyo ifyabipa. Soseni njishishe, no kuntungulula; soseni ngumfwikishe, mwambako mutima.
Mwe yesu mwalaile bonsha bamukonka bakaba uko muli, cifulo cisuma. Mwe yesu nalaile kutumikila pe; bampele icikuku, mwe shikulu, nkonke.
Kamone nkasa shenu, nyendemo ne mwine; nakulakonka bwino, mu maka yenu pe. Ntungululwe, munjite, munjikatishe pe; e lyo mumpokelele, ku mulu kuli’mwe.

hymns.title: Hark, the second of holy voices
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 112. Hark, the second of holy voices
verses: Umfweni yalya mashiwi, bemba kulyo ko muli; aleluay! Aleluya! Aleluya! Kuli’mwe! Ibumba, awe, ni tunta, beminine ne fyabutisha, fya bwanshisho bekata.
Nabafuma mu macula, balisambwe mitima mu mulopa wa kwa yesu, baeshiwa, bashansha. Basowekwe, no kukakwa, balashilwe no kufwa; bayanshe mfwa  na satana, mu maka ya kwa lesa.
Baleenda no luunga lwa lupando lwacimfya; balekonka imwe bene, mupusushi, katula. Bamuculile ne nseko, no kumufwila pamo, na mu mfwa basango mweo w ape wa ciyayaya.
Baleteka mu bukata, balenda mu lubuto; balenwa nga ku mumana Buseko bwa mushilo mutemwa na ko kwa pe; ilyo baikala palya bamona leso mwine.
Yesu kristwa ba ni lesa, ali ne’few manyule; mu mubili wakwe wine bena mwakwe’mo bali. Mutwafwe’kuti tutote, kuli lesa patatu; kuli lesa shifwe, leso mwana, na lesa umupashi.

hymns.title: Work for the night is coming
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 113. Work for the night is coming
verses: Bomba tabulaila, bomba apo bwaca, bomba kucilyu mume wa pa maluba. Bomba kacelocelo, bombe lyo kabala, bomba tabulaila, lyo tababomba.
Bomba tabulaila, bomba kasansama, bomba inshita sonse, lyenyu kutusha. Te kuti wikale fye, kano ulebomba; bomba tabulaila, lyo tababomba.
Bomba tabulaila, kasuba kacepa; bomba uciyu mona, pantu kaleya. Bombo lubuto lwaya, no kukanabwela, bomba tabulaila, lyo tababomba.

hymns.title: When upon life’s billows
verses: Mu bulanda bonse ubo usanga, mu kushuka konse, mu kupelelwa, pende fintu fyonse lesa akupa, cine uletasha pantu fyafula.
Pende fintu fyonse fisuma, pende fya bupe bwa kwa lesa, pende kale, penda na nomba, cine uletasha pantu fyafula.
Wafininwa no kucula we mwana; ulupanda nausenda lwafina; pende fintu fyonse lesa akupa, lwimbo kumutotela ulesanga.
Nomba mu kulwisha konse witendwa, lesa mukalamba alekumona, wene aishibe nshila ulye. Lwendo lonse mwine akulakwafwa.

hymns.title: Hark my soul
verses: Umfwo mutima wandi, ni shikulu, aleti, yesu alekwipusha; bushe cine wantemwa?
Nakukakwile kale, filaso naposeshe; lubuto nakupele, mfifi obe nalwile.
Bushe nyina alabe mwana untu afyele? Nalimo kutya laba, ine ndakwibukisha.
“luse luntu mbelo lu lwacile fya mu mulu. Lwacile fya mwi samba, lwa cine, lwacile mfwa.
“ukamono lulumbi luntu tata ampele; ukekala na ine pa cipuna candi pe”
Ine ndino bulanda, kutemwa nshakwatish; cine imwe natemwa, lelo mfwayo kucisha.

hymns.title: Thou say’st take up thy cross
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 116. Thou say’st take up thy cross
verses: “sumbulo lupande, we muntu we, nkonka” kuli mfifi, natunaka, lelo twalakonka.
Mwe mfumu twafwaya kuti tumumone ku mpumi yenwa kashita, e lyo tulekonka.
Mu nshita sha kale twaleulunta  fye; lelo nomba katubwele, ni’mwe twalakonka.
Shiwi lyaumfwikwa ilya ku ngalile, twaiso kumunakila, kuti tumukonke.
Ifwe mpofu, na matwi yakoma, mutwafwe mu maka yenu, e lyo twalakonka.
Mu mitima yesu iseni mupepi, tekeni muli’fwe benu, mwe mfumu twakonka.

hymns.title: A soldier of the cross
verses: Bushe ndi mushilikale, kakonka wa mpanga? Bushe nkatina mu nshila, no kuba ne nsoni?
Ishina…… ilyawama……. Wene amfwilile; mu cikuku nkapokela icitebo candi.
Bushe nje mu mulu mulya kwabulo kucula, ilyo bambi balecula mu fikali fyonse?
Bushe balwani tapali aba kulwa nabo?bushe calo cilengafwa kufika ku mulu?
Bushe calo cilengafwa kufika ku mulu?
Kulwa kwandi kwiba kwa fye, munkoshe mwe mfumu; nkashipikisha macusho mu mashiwi yenu.

hymns.title: Soldiers of the cross
verses: Mwe fita fya lupanda, fya kulwila fwaleni; satana e wa maka, mwe baume, konseni.
Na mu ca mfifi imyeni uluunga, ulu lufunguluke, ku ntanshi lusumbulwe.
Mu mishi ya bulanda, tamwaba na mashiwi, mwe nkombe sha kwa yesu. Kabiye ne landwe.
Kuntu kwabe finshingwa, batwalileni cine; uko kwabe fyabipa, bupususho mwananye.
Ku banaka baluba, bebeni no mutende; ku baposwa, balanda, soseni umutende.
Sungeni abapina, sansamusheni bonse; mu maka ya kwa lesa, tamfyeni fibi fyonse.
Fungululenyu lunga, no lupanga lwe shiwi, fisuke fyalo fyonse fikabe kwa yesu.

hymns.title: Onward Christian soldiers
verses: Mwe bashilikale, mwaya ku buta, lupanda lwa mwine luletangila. Yesu mfumu yesu, akulatwensha, no luunga lwesu twakulasenda.
Mwe bashilikale, mwaya ku buta,, mwaya ku buta, lupanda lwa mwine luletangila.
Pa bwanshisho bwesubaletamfwa; e lya ba kwa yesu, twendeni, twanshe, na pa kwimbakwesu ku mbo kwatenta; imbileni yesu, shi sansuleni.
Bumba lya kwa lesa, cilonganino; bane, tuleenda nga ba mushilo. Few mubili umo, tatwalekana mu bucetekelo nelyo mu luse.
E twendeni bane, na bonse pamo, na mashiwi twimbe ulwimbo lwesu; pelenyo lulumbi ku mfumu yesu; bantwa balubulwa baleimbo lu.

hymns.title: Take my life
verses: Buleni ine wine, naipela kuli’mwe; nshiku shandi shonse fye, leka mulumbanyeandi, kuti imubombele; makasa yandi nay o yamukonkyo lubilo.
Buleni shiwi lyandi, kuti nyimbile imwe; pamo na kanwa kandi, kesulemo ilandwe.
Buleni fyuma fyandi awe te’ti mutane. Maka yandi na mano, kamubombele nay o.
Buleni mifwile, ndepela kuli imwe; mu mutima wandyu yu mube cipuma cenu.
Buleni ukutemwa, kuti mutemwe, kuti mutemwe mweka; mumbule ine wine, kuti mbe wenu onse.

hymns.title: Nearer my God to thee
verses: Kamupalamine lesa wandi, ngo mwenso wandeta uko muli; lwimbo lwandi lube; kamupalamine, lesa wandi.
Nga ndi mu bulendo, naililwa, mfifi yafitisha, nalala fye. Mu ciloto mpepa; kamupalamine, lesa wandi.
Ilyo nasamina mutwe pe bwe, no busanshi bwandi ni pa nshi fye; e lyo mpapa, ntila: kamupalamine, lesa wandi.
Lintu nashibuka, natotela, e lyo natole bwe, ncite betel. Mu bulanda ntila: kamupalamine, lesa wandi.
Lintu nkashe calo, nkapupuka, nungame ku mulu uko muli. No lu lwimbo lube; kamupalamine, lesa wandi.

hymns.title: Jesus savior pilot me
verses: Yesu muntungulule pa cimana ca mweo;amabimbi yaisa, mabwe ayabelama imwe mwaishibisha, yesu muntungulule.
Fyo nyina lelo mwana, mwingateke cimana; mabimbi yaikala, lintu muleyasosha; mwe mfumu ya cimana, yesu muntungulule.
Lintu nkapalamikwe, no mwenso wanjikata; lyene nkacetekela, mukangafwo kupepa, na mwi sano mwa lesa, e, mukantungulula.

hymns.title: O master let me walk
verses: Mwe mfumu, nyende na imwe mu milimo ya bufuke; munjebe nkama mwakwata ya kuti na ine nshipe.
Mungafwe ncincisha bantu ne shiwi lya luse lwenu; nkatungululya baluba ku nshila yenu yawama.
Mumfundishe umukosha; njikale mwi senge lyenu. Milimo into mumpela yafwe busumino bwandi.
Lubuto lwenu lube pe pa nshila yandi pano nse; mutende wenu mumpele, mwe mfumu njikale ne mwe.

hymns.title: He leadeth me
verses: Lesa alentungulula, na ku mutima kwabuta; pano isonde ndeenda, lesa alentungululla.
Lesa alentungulula, ku kuboko anjikata; ine nakulamukonka, lesa alentungulula.
Nangu nyendo mwasapisha, nangu mu nshila yabuta, mu fisuma, mu fyabipa, lesa alentungulula.
Mwe lesa, nyenda na imwe, kwabulo kuti nwinwinte. Nyende no mutima-nteka. Lesa alentungulula.
Lintwi milimo ikapwa, ulwendo lwandi lwapela, nshakatine lintu nkafwa, lesa alentungulula.

hymns.title: When peace like a river
verses: Ilintu mutende uleya na ine, nangwa malanda yesa pe; ni mwe mwamfundisho kuti njishibe, mutende kuli’ne.
Mutende……kuli;ne…… mutende, mutende kuli’ne.

Satana nga’ntunka, nga kwiso kweshiwa, ninjishibe landwe ili, alimfwilile, kristu nandubula, mutende, mutendente kuli’ne. impulumushi shintu nacitacita, te shimo fye, lelo shonse, shalipampaminwa na kuli’ne.
Na ine ndefwaya njikalile kristu; nga yakamfimba mabimbi, te kuti ntine; mu mfwa na mu mweo, mutende, mutende kuli’ne.
E kwisa kwenu ndepembela, mwe mfumu, ku mwesu te ku cilindi; penga lya mungeli, shiwi lya mfumu, mutende, mutende kuli’ne.

hymns.title: Lord speak to me
verses: Munsosho kuti’ne nsose umusango umo wine; fyo mwalefwaya, kamfwaye abana benwa baluba.
Muntugululyo kuti’ne ntungulule abaluba, mundisho kuti’ne ndishe abana benwa ba nsala.
Munkoshe mu kwiminina pa libwe lya maka yenu, ntambikyo kuboko kwandi ku bantwa baleila.
Mumfundisho kuti mfunde fintu fyenu ifya cine, mashiwi yandi yengile mu ba mitima yakosa.
Mumpelyo butsho bwenu, kuti nsose no kutemwa, amashiwi ayalinga ku bafilwa, ba bulanda.
Mumpale mwe mfumu yandi, kutyu mutima wisule matontonkanyo ya luse, mbalangyo kutemwa kwine.
Munengyo kumubombela konsho ko mwansontelela, nsuke munone pa menso, nsekele, ntushe ku mulu.

hymns.title: O where are the reapers?
verses: Yangu! Abalimi nga bali kwi? Bese balobolole mu fibi. Ifya kulobolwelako cine, kukanatusha basuka bapwa.
Aba kusepa nga bali kwi ba kwisabombo bulobololo? Aba kutwafwo kulobolola abantu babi ku fyabipa.
Mu nshila sha tondo kabiyeni, musote nge ngano mu finangwa; mufwailishe na mu misebo, no kwisabengisha mu bufumu.
Ingano nashipya konse konse, balelinda ubulobololo; bwakulisha, balimi bacepa, bwalaoneka nga bwakokola.
E co ishileni ine fikwakwa, mwe bana, mutuntuluya male. Bombesheni’suke mfumu ise ku kususo bulimi ne nseko.

hymns.title: Rejoice in the lord
verses: Wange mu mfumu, na mu luse lwakwe, mwine e watukakwile; twalilubulwa mu mulopa wakwe, nomba kuti twatina nshi?
Tuli na lesa, tuli na lesa, n’ani wa kututinya, n’ani? N’ani nombo wa kututinya?
Kosa mu mfumu, na mu maka yakwe, ubyo muntu wa cine pe; pa kwise fibi, uleshangila fye, kristu e nkwela tukwete.
Sumine mfumu, na mwi buku lyakwe, ifyalembwamo fya cine; calo cikapwa, mulu na o pamo, ili likabelelela.
Uba mu mfumu, mu kuboko kwakwe, e kutendeka kwa mweo. Mulwani onse, nangu abe n’ani, te kuti akufumyemo.

hymns.title: Hide me O my saviour
verses: Mfisa we mfumu, we mwine, mu lwafyo lobe, lulumbi lobe lumfimbe, nkumone pa menso.
Mfisa, mfisa, we mupusushi mfisa, we mfumu ndama, mfisame muli’we.
Icipupu canyimina kuno uko ndi, mpisha ku mulu wa ciko, nsumbulwe kuli’we.
Musana nga wafunika mu kuculisha, pa kututa, “mfumu ngafwa,” we mwine ngasuka.
Mfisa mfumu, napapata, nshili na maka, we wa maka mupusushi, ni’we mulubushi.

hymns.title: I need thee
verses: Ndamukabila pe, mwe mfumu yandi, tapali na umbi wa kumpo mutende.
Nkabila pe nkabila, imwe pe nomba line, naisalomba.
Ndamukabila pe, mwikale mupepi; matunko yali fye nga muli kuntu ndi.
Ndamukabila pe, kwanga no kucula;nga tamwapalame, mweo wandi wa nshi?
Ndamukanbila pe, mumfundishe fyenu, no bulayo bwine mumfikishishe.
Ndamukabila pe, mwe ba mushilo, nomba nsangululwe,
Mumpalyo bupalo.

hymns.title: Lord of our life
verses: Mfumu ya bumi, lesa wa mu mulu, ni’mwe fye mweka, lubuto lwa bantu, mumfwa mapepo lintu tulelomba, mfumu ya maka.
Moneni fya mabimbi yatuwisha, moneni fita fyatushinguluka; mwe mfumu, ilye fibi fyatucusha, mutupusushe.
Mfumu itwe lintwa maka yapwa, mfumu tutule ku fyabipa fyesu. Tapali umbe wa kucila imwe, penyu mutende.
Mutwafwe bonse, mucimfye fyabipa, tulenya babi, bena balapile. Ilintu kulwa kwa mu calo kwapwa, tuye ku mulu.

hymns.title: Jesus, still lead on
verses: Yesu, mutwenshe, tuye tutushe, nelyo nshila ilecusha, tukakonka no kukosa; tungululeni, mwende na imwe.
Nshila yayafya, satana pamfya, twishika no kutina, tube fye abasumina; twende tushipe na ku balwani.
Ilyo twacula, nga batusula; nga twatunkwa no kweshiwa, mwisetwafwa mwe kacimfya; tulosha menso uko ku mwesu.
Yesu mutwenshe, tuye tutushe; ntungulushi yak u mulu, mutucinge muno calo, tusuke tube pamo na imwe.

hymns.title: Peace, perfect peace
verses: Umutende, mu calo cabipa? Mutende, yesu atepelesha.
Umutnde, nge ncito yapamfya? Kubombela yesu e kutusha.
Umutende, bulanda bwafula? Mutende, kwa yesu pa cifuba.
Umutende, mfuluka ku mwesu? Mutende mu kulamwa na yesu.
Umutende nge mfwa ilenshinga? Na maka yesu ayanshishe mfwa.
E cisuma; fyonse fikaleka. Mutende wa ku mulu watwita.

hymns.title: Jesus the very thought of thee
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 134. Jesus the very thought of thee
verses: Yesu lintu mwibukisha mutima wabuta; ukumonana pa menso kwena cikacila.
Mu fyalo fyonse fya pa nshi, na mu mulu mwine, shina lyenu e lyawama, mwe katula wandi.
Bucetekelo bwa bonse abwa bapelelwa; abakawa mukabemya, mwe bakwata maka.
Abamusanga bashuka, imwe mwabatemwa; twafilwo kulumbulula ukutemwa kwenu.
Yesu mabyo kwanga kwesu, nshiku shonse pano; mukabo lulumbi lwesu ku mulu ku mwenu.

hymns.title: How sweet the name
verses: Shina lya yesu busuma ku ba busumino! Lilefumya ubulanda, no kutamfyo mwenso.
Lile posha abalanda, nab o abacula, ifya kulya fya ba nsala, na bo abanaka, libwe lyandya po nakula, ni nkwela yam aka, cibikilo icafusha bwingi bwa cikuku.
Yesu ni kacema wandi, ni mfumu, katula, mwine wandi, mweo wandi, mumfwe amalumbo.
Mutima wandi ushipe, no luse lwicepa; e lyo lintu nkamumona nakulamupepa.
Ine nakulashimika lyonse ndi no mweo; lekeni shina li line linsuge na mu mfwa.

hymns.title: I hear the words of love
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 136. I hear the words of love
verses: Ndeumfwa mashiwi, ndetambo mulopa, namone lambo likulu, lyampelo mutende.
Umutende w ape, lesa aliso; uli nge cipuna cakwe, wa kubelela.
Makumbi nayese, ifipupu na fyo, tuli ne senge na kristu, talyakapele’yo.
Ukutemwa kwandi nangu kube shani, mutende nankwe washala, mfumu tayaluka.
Kwaluka ndaluka, lelo kristu tafwa. Pa luse lwakwe ndatusha, talaya bufi’yo.

hymns.title: Art thou weary?
verses: Bushe iwe naunaka, naupelelwa? Yesu ati, “iso ko ndi tushisha”
Bushe akwate filaso kuti mwishibe? E mu mbafu na maboko ne nkasa.
Bushe alifwele ngala pa mutwe wakwe? Cine ngala alifwele, ya myunga.
Alempela cinshi nomba nga namukonka? Ubulanda ne filamba, kucula.
Nga namukonka mupepi, cinshi ku mpela? Ubulanda ne filamba fikapwa.
Nga namulombo kumbula ankaninine? Waishiletula bantu takana.
Kusanga, kukonka, kulwa, bushe ampale? Ba mu calwa ba mu mulu bati, “e”.

hymns.title: Jesus, son of God
verses: Yesu yu, mwana lesa, yesu, mulopa watusumine; nomba mutwafwe, kuti fibi fyonse fyo twalecita, tupose.
Lesa shifwe, yesu mwana wenu afwililya bantu bonse; tumulumbanye, yesu e katula wa maka yonse, no luse.
Mfumu yesu, tuli mu mfifi fye, pa kutemwe fya mu calo twaliluba fye, mutukakule mu minyololo, tuli basha.
Mu mafunde yesu atupele, ati “sende landwe lyandi mu calo conse; ndemupa maka kuleta bonse kuli ine”

hymns.title: We love the place o God
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 139. We love the place o God
verses: Cifulo twatemwa, ica bucindamo, nseko e mo shaba shacile sha calo.
Inganda twatemwa, umwa kulongana, umo ne mwe Mwaba, e mo twakumana.
Mashiwi twatemwa, ya mweo, mutende, yatusansamusha, yatusekesha pe.
Ukwimba twatemwa, pa bupe bukulu, lelo twafuluka ukwimba ku mulu.
Yesu twamutemwa, tupelwe cikuku c kumutemwisha kuno na ku mulu.

hymns.title: For ever with the lord
verses: “pe fye kuli lesa!” amen, ify fine; mweo uli mwi shiwi’ili, mweo wa munshipwa muno mu mubili ndeendaenda fye, nangwi ndo shalepa shani, tuleya ku mushi.
Kwa shifwe ku mulu, kulya ni ku mwesu; limo mu mutimma namone cipata, e lyo nafuluka, kufiko k kwine, ku yerusalemu upya, calwe co twapelwa.
“pe fye kuli lesa!” tata nga mwatemwa, mufikilishe shiwi’li kuli ine nomba. Mube mupepi fye, e lyo nshakalewa; munjikatishe, mungafwe ukulwa no kwansha.
Nga nkaleko mweo, nkapula mu kati, pa kufwa nkafuma mu mfwa, mweo nayasanga. Lyene nkeshibisha, yangwe1 fyo natemwa kusose shiwi ili pe: “pe fye kuli lesa!”
Penga lya kwa lesa, shiwi limo line; likomfwikwa na mu nshishi, “pe fye kuli lesa” lishiwi lya kwima, kupundo bwanshisho; kabili, “pe fye kwa lesa!” amen,ifyo fine.

hymns.title: The sabds of time are sinking
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 141. The sabds of time are sinking
verses: Lulepwo lwendo lwandi, kuleca ku mulu; nafwaisha kasuba akabutu tutu. Bushiku bwafitishe, lwaiso lucelo, no kucindama kwaba kulya kwi sano.
Kristu sishima cine ca luse lwacisha; amenshi nanwa pa nshi, ku mulu nkanwisha; mimana ya cikuku yakula ku mulu, no kucindama kwaba kulya ku mfumu.
Naba ne wa kwa kristu, na kristu e wandi; ampoka ne mubembu, e kushuka kwandi, ni kristu ncetkela, wa luse lwacila, na ku bukata bwine kulya kwashila.
Nge fyo nabwinga lumba shibwinga wakwe fye, ndelosha menso yandi kuli kristu mwine; te ku cilambu cakwe, kano ku filaso; e mfumu yacindama, kulya ku mulu.
Mu lwendo lwandi lonse anyensha na mano Mwaba no butemwo, nkale ntungulushi, nkatotela kristu, ukwacindame cibi, kulya ku mfumu.
Nalipamine nshila, no mwela ne mfula; nomba ndi ngo mulendo na maka yacepa. Kasuba nomba kawa, lulepwo lwendo lu; ndecelelo bikata kulya ku mulu.

hymns.title: I lay my sins on Jesus
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 142. I lay my sins on Jesus
verses: Shabikilwe pa mfumu mpulumushi shandi, yalinsendele shonse, yankakwile cine; naisa kuli yesu kuti ansambemo kubuta ku mulopa, kwishal na kamo.
Naleta kuli yesu ifintu nabulwa; amposha ku malwele, mutima aposha. Nabika pali yesu bulanda ninkwata; awe nintula fyonse, wene e wapoka.
Watusha pali yesu umutima wandi; wene amfukatila, nasekele cibi. Natemwe shina lyakwe, imanyule kristu, nge cena cawamisha lyafika ku bantu.
Kampalane na yesu, msuma, mufuke, kuti mbe ifyo aba, mwana wa kwa wishi. Nafuluka kwa yesu, ku mulu ku mwakwe, ukwimba malumbanyo pamo na bakwe pe.
AKACELO

hymns.title: New every morning
verses: Kacelo pe lupya lutushibusha, lutwimya, lutupususha mu mfifi, lutubwkesha ku bumi.
Uluse lupye nshiku pe luba mupepi na ifwe; lututula, tutwelela, lufundishe fya kwa lesa.
Imilimo ya fye yonse yatupele cotwafwaya. Kuti twikanye fyabipa, tupalame kuli lesa.
Mulandu wa luse lwenu, mutufishe kuli imwe, mutwafwe kuti twikale mu luse lwenu nshiku pe.

hymns.title: Awake my soul
verses: We mutima, shi shibuka, sh’enda pamo na kasuba; ima ne nseko no kuya ku kwimba no kutotela.
Shibuka no kusansula kumo na bamalaika; benyo kwimba tabanaka, inyimbo sha kuli lesa.
Nalumbanya, mwe bandama mu tulo ilyo ndetusha, lyene mu mfwa nga nabuka, e mweo wa ciyayaya.
Mwe mfumu, nomba nalomba mufulunganye fyabipa. Mungafwe, matontonkanyo yabe kuli imwe lelo.
Mutungulule, mumfunde, misosele, micitile, na maka yandi yonse fye numbanyo luse lwenu pe.
Kuli lesa tuletota, ifintu fyonse atupa; toteni bonse mu mulu, wishi, mwana, no mupashi.

hymns.title: Lead kindly light
verses: Ni’mwe lubuto ku calo conse, butusheni; ni’mwe lutanda lwa pa kacelo, cinsakambwe. Mwati, “cebenya menso ku mulu, mulemono lulumbi lwa uko”
Limbi kale twapumbile nshila yak u myesu; makasa yesu na menso pamo fyali fya fye. Mwatulililyo bulanda ni’mwe, no kutukumya bonse pa menso.
Ni aleluay e lo natwimbe muno nshila; kutemwa kwenu e kutusunga, few bafilwa. Twamulumbanya mwe batuwamya, tuletota, twacitilwe fingi.
We mfwa nobe, bulamba buli pi, no lubola? Nombe mfumu yafumye cifimbo, calepulwa. Ni’mwe lubuto, mwe baletwita ku luse lwenu lwa munshipela.

hymns.title: O lord it is a blessed thing
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 146. O lord it is a blessed thing
verses: Mwe mfumu, e cawamisha, bwaca no bwailo kwisa kuli imwe no kupepa.
Kuno kuli fye tondolo, tatulatendeke ncito, twalombe lelo bupalo.
Nga bwaila inshiku pe, twaisafukama kuli’mwe, ukuti tumutotele.
Mubyo lubutwa kacelo, na lyonse tuli mu lwendo, tulwishe fibi mwi pepo.
Nge nctito yapwe cugulo, twaisayebelelako, kabinge pe ne lubuto.
Ni mwe lubuto lwa calo, tutungululwe na pano, kacelo pe ne cungulo.

hymns.title: When morning gilds the skies
verses: Lintu bushiku buca, mutima ulatila; yeswa lumbaniwe! Mwi pepo ne ncito kwa yesu ndayako yeswa lumbaniwe!
Lintu nsenauka fye, no tulo nshimona, yeswa lumbaniwe! Matontonkanyo yabi nakulakanya ne ci; yeswa lumbaniwe!
Nga ndi no bulanda, mutima ndateka, yeswa lumbaniwe! Nga fino ndi mupina kansose mu mutima: yeswa lumbaniwe!.
Mu mulu mwa lesa bangeli basosa: yeswa lumbaniwe! Pamo na bantu pa nshi balemba na mashiwi: yeswa lumbaniwe!
E lyo no lwimbo lu ndeimbila yesu: yeswa lumbaniwe! No lu lwimbo lwa pe, lwa mu myaka yonse: yeswa lumbaniwe!

hymns.title: Hail sacred Day
verses: We bushiku bwa kutusha, bwabulwe milimo, we bushiku bundetela fya Buseko.
Ukutalala shilili kuli konse konse, kwaimyo mutima wandi kuli imwe.
Takuli ciunda, congo, pantwi ncito yapwa; takuli mashiwa, kano aya kwimba.
Fya pano nsefiloluka, mpalamyo ko muli; na ifwe twaesho kwimba nga bangeli.
Abo abemba pano ne kulumbanya kwabo: nge nyimbo sha pano shapwa, bakembo ko.
Mwe lesa ni mwe mwatupa ubushiku ubu; ca kusonda ubutusho bwa mu mulu.

hymns.title: The dawn of God’s dear Sabbath
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 149. The dawn of God’s dear Sabbath
