verses: Bushiku bwa kwa lesa bucele mu calo, buli ngo bwa kundapa ku bafufyo tulo buleisa nge cintelelwe kuntu kabalike.
Ilelo ubulanda bwasanguke nseko; kabinge ukweshiwa kwaba e bupalo; insala e kwikuta kunaka butusho, kulwala e kwikala muli yesu kristu.
Mwe mfumu, fwe twaleta ubupe kuli mwe bwa nshiku sha milimo ya mpofu, ya cine;fisabo fya kwikanya, fya luse kuli mwe, fyasabwa mu mitima; few twaleto bupe.
Kabinge fwe twaleta cisendo ca bubi, tulemufukamina kuti mutwelel; bulanda bwa mitima, bwa milimo yonse into tushicitile, intu mwatupele.
Ni’ fyo fine, mwe mfumu, twakulafwaya pe mu cinso ca kwa yesu kuti tulubanye. Pa bushiku bwe lelo, na mu ng’anda yenu. Kutota kwa mushilo pe  fye kube kwesu.
E ilyo nga no Buseko ku mwesu twafika. Bulanda ne cikonko ne fibi fikapwa. Ne lintu abangeli nabatulonganya, mwe lesa, mupusushi, shikulu, twatota.

hymns.title: O day of rest and gladness.
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 150. O day of rest and gladness.
verses: Bushiku bwa kutusha, bwa lubuto, nseko; bwapwisha fye citendwe, bwayemba, tondolo.
Bwaba kafukauka ka mu ciswebebe; ilelo tulemona ifikesabapo.
Pali buno, lubuto lwacitilwe kale; pali buno, shikulu aiminyo mumi; pali buno pe paska mupashiapelwe; lubuto lwa patatu mulyu bo lwabwela.
Ilelo pa mikowa fya mulu fyaisa; twaiso kulongana, ingoma yatwita; kunwe landwe lyasoswa, lyakulayanana, nga menshi yalengama lyatukoselesha.
Icikuku na cimbi ilelo twasanga: tukasukya tufiak ku butusho bwine. Ku mupashi wabuta, na shifwe no mwana, abenu baletota, bakulalumbanya.
ICUNGULO

hymns.title: Glory to thee
verses: Lesa wandi natotela. Mapalo yonse napelwa. Munteke bwino bushiku, ntushe mu kuboko kwenu.
Munjelele mfumu yandi, fyonse fyabipa nincita ku ba mu calo na imwe; pa kulala mbyo mutende.
Tulumbanye lesa wesu, e mutule palo yesu. Ba mu calo, ba mulu, lumbeni lesa patatu.

hymns.title: Saviour breathe
verses: Mutupale mupusushi, tucili tulelola; natwiso kuyase fibi, ni’mwe mwintatwelela.
Nangula ubonaushi mupepi bwatushinsha, mwatucingilila ni’mwe, nga mulipo twatulwa.
Nangwi mfifi te’ti tufise; imwe pe fye tamulala, musunga, mutulinda.
Mfwa nga iletuponena apo tulesendama, ulucelo tushibuk no kwikala na imwe.

hymns.title: When the day of toil
verses: Lintwi ncito naipwa, lwendo na lo nalupwa, peleni uwanaka butusho bwa pe.
Lintu kulwishe fibi kwapwa, e na balwani bafwa, lyene peleni mutende wa pe.
Lintwi mfifi yapita, pa kuca twasekela, twatote co mwatupa. Lubuto lwa pe.
Umutima wacula, limbi fyonse fikapwa; mutufisho ko bwaba Buseko bwa pe.
Nga twafuluke nshiku ishapitila kale, mutupele ku mulu kutemwa kwa pe.
Lintu twaleko mweo, mu nshishi twashikwamo; mutupele citebo ca mweo w ape.

hymns.title: Sweet saviour bless us
verses: Mwe katula mutupale ilyo tatulalekana: mitima yesu ikabe no kutemwa no kwitaba.
Mu mfifi ya mfwa, mu mweo, mwe yesu mubyo lubuto.
Nomba bwaila, nakawa, mwamona fyonse twacita; ifisuma ne fyabipa, ukwima nangu ukuwa.
Mwe mfumu mutukakule mu fikakilo fya fibi; na Mapalo muyafushe, tusambwe, tubyo mutende.
Na cimbi mutwelelepo, tumutine, tumutemwe, mulundepo no Buseko, twesho kumupalanya pe.
Bonse twatemwa, bapina na babi, twabapepela; muli’mwe yesu ni’mwe katula.

hymns.title: Sun of my soul
verses: Ni’mwe kasuba ka mweo, te bushiku nga mulipo; ikumbi limo liisa ku menso ku kumufisa.
Lintu ndelala mu tulo, no kushibata amenso, amatontonkonyo yabe ya kuli’mwe, mupusushi.
Mube na ine’neka yo; mube na ine bwaila, te’ti mfwe kano mulipo.
Nga umo wa bana benu, naulungana ilelo, naulungana ilelo, mwe mfumu mubombe nomba kuti mu fibi elala.
Abalwele mubalinde, na bapina mubapale; ba kulosho bushiku bu balale bwino mu tulo.
Mukatupalya kacelo, tatulaenda mu calo, tukasuke tukafike, ku mulu, mu luse lwenu.

hymns.title: The day thou gavest
verses: Kasuba mwatupa nakawa, mwaebe mfifi ipone; kacelo twacimulumbanya, ne cunguo ni’fyo fine.
Tulemutotela mulandu cilonganino cenu pe tacisendama na mu tulo, kano kulola pano nse.
Mu fyalo, e na mu filial, bushiku bucele bwino; shiwi lye pepo talileka, nelyo ishiwi lya nyimbo.
Kasuba katuwila kuno kalashibusha banensu; e balepokelelo lwimbo kutasha lesa mukulu.
Ifyo fine; cipuna cenu te kuti cifumepo pe; bufumu bulebelelela, bakasuke bamuwile.

hymns.title: Abide with me
verses: Mube na ine, lesa wandi pe, mfifi ilipo, mube na ine. Pantu’mbi wa kungafwa nshikwete, mwe kafwa wandi, mube na ine.
Nshiku shesu shilepita bwangu, ifya kuno tafibelelela; ifya calo fya twaluka fyonse, mwe bashaluka mube na ine.
Te kwisa nge mfumu ya shamfumu, mu bukali no kutinya bantu; lelo mwise mu lusho, mutende, mwe kafwa wandi mube na ine.
Ndamukabila umo shacela, mumpya maka ya kwansha katunka; ba kuntungulula mweka ni mwe, monsho mo mpita mube na ine
Nga muli mupepi nshiletina, mu bulanda mulensansamusha; mfwa ne cilindi te kuti ntine, dansha fyonse nga muli na ine.
Monyo lupanda nga nashibata, mu mfifi mukamengeshimina, bushiku bwaca mu mulu, lyene mu mweo, mu mfwa, mube na ine.

hymns.title: Saviour again
verses: Mwe mfumu, no mutima umo fye, nomba twaimbile shina lyenu; twaima, twatota, twalekekako, tulefukama, mutupaleko.
Penyu mutende mu nshila shesu; lwendo lwesu lukapwa ku mulu, sungeni milomo ne mitima lyamupepa muno mu ng’anda.
Penyu mutende ubushiku bu, mfifi isanguke ulubuto; mubakya bana benu ku fibi, mfifi, lubuto, cimo kuli’mwe.
Penyu mutende nshiku shonse pe, ba kukeka, bakafwa ni mwe, lintu tuketwo kuya ku mulu, tuketaba no kwanga, mwe.

hymns.title: The day is past
verses: Bushiku bu bwaila, natota mwe mfumu; nalombo kuti fibi fiisa bushiku
Mundame bwino, mwe mfumu, no kumbaka ubushiku.
Nseko she lelo shapwa, napepa kuli’mwe, nalomba nibipilwa nshita ya bushiku.
Milimo yapwe lelo, ndeimbo lwimbo lu, nati mwileka mwenso wise ubushiku.
Kabaka wandi ni’mwe, pantu mwaishaba ifibi fyabe finge umo nyendaenda.
Mwe mfumu yesu, mung’few, mumbake pe, mumupusushe.

hymns.title: Father in high heaven
verses: Shifwe wa mu mulu wine, nyimbo shesu sha cungulo shilelumbulo luse, mwatusunga akasuba, mwacilatutungulula, pantu muli bal use.
Fibi fyonse ifye lelo fya mitima na maboko, mutwelele fyonse fi. Ku calo na ku mubili nshiku shonse tupusuke, katula wa kalbale.
Ku matunko ya kwa ciwa ne mipashi iyabipa, mube umupusushi. Ubushiku mutubake, no mutende ube ne few tucili pa masunshi.
Nombo bushiku bwaila, mwe katula mutukoshe no bupalo bwenu fye mu mfifi na mu busanso, tumfwe ifyo muli pano, mupusushi wa luse.

hymns.title: Now the day is over
verses: Akasuba kawa, nomba bwaila; milimo naipwa, bantu batusha.
Nomba kuli mfifi, ntanda shabeka, inama ne fyuni filesendama.
Banaka bapelwo tulo tusuma; no bupalo bwenu tuleshibata.
Mupele abana bamone imwe; mutule bacoba ba pa cambeshi.
Musungya balwele abakalipwa; abacite fibi mulebelela.
Ubushiku buno bangeli bene batubake bwino, e batulinde.
Ngo bushiku bwaca mukanyimye mwe, ukwabule fibi, nyende na imwe, nyenda na imwe.
Tulumbanye lesa, wishi na mwane, mupashi wabuta, nshiku shonse pe.

hymns.title: Millions within thy courts
verses: Baciba nabalongana, bengi bacimupakata, mpumi bacishikimika, kuli imwe bacipepa.
Ilyo bushiku bucele pa milundu na mabemba, bamwano bacishibuka, ku kusungo bushiku bu.
Kabanga na ku masamba, kapinda e na ku maca, abantu bacimuwila, baima, bamuumbanya.
Ifilamba na mapepo fyonse nafyumfwika lelo; na basangwa no bucushi tabamukutilya pa fye.
Baipakisha bapina, abelelwa basekela; basansamuka balosha, babuta bamona lesa.
Ipepo limo lyashala, lya pamo nse, lya mu mulu; mupwishe fyo mwalaile, benike yesu, “shikulu”

hymns.title: At even ere the sun was set
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 163. At even ere the sun was set
verses: Lyo kaile pa cungulo, baishile abalwala; bafuma baya ne nseko, abeshile baleteta.
Kabinge nombe cungulo, ne fwe twaishibe fyo mulipo, nangula tushimumwene.
Tusansamuke, katula, pantu twalwala, twapina bamo tabalamutemwa, bambi bamufutatila.
Bamo basange fyo calo tacisekesho mutima kuli imwe tabesako kuti bapwishe cilaka.
Tapalya batusha bwino, pantu tababulwe fibi abamufwaisha nab o bali ne fibi mu kati.
Mwe shikulu mwali muntu, mwacushiwe no kwshiwa; tatwafise fibi fyesu, menso yenu yalamona.
Kukumya kwenu kwa kale kulipo mu nshite ye, muposhe bonse nakalya.

hymns.title: Lord dismiss us
verses: Mutufumye no bupalo mu mitima yesu pe; tube no kutemwa kwenu, twange mu luse lwenu. Mutukoshe, mutukoshe, lyonse tuli pano nse.
No mucinshi twatotela pa mashiwi yasuma; yabe fya kulya fya mweo, yekale mu mitima. Imwe bene, imwe bene, mube ne few nshiku pe.
E lye lintu twapalama no kufuma mu valo, ilyo tuketwa ku mulu, tuketaba ne nseko. Tukekala, tukekala na yesu inshiku pe.
UKUPEPA

hymns.title: The lord’s prayer
verses: Mwe ba shifwe wa mu mulu, shina licindikwe; bufumu bwisho, bufwayo bucitwe pano nse.
Mutupe lelo ifilyo; mutwelele fibi, ifyo twelela banensu abatubale fwe.
Mwituleta mu kweshiwa, mupokolole fwe, bufumu bwenu na maka, lulumbi pen a pe, amen.

hymns.title: (Tune; A little lamb went staying)
verses: Upepe ku macaca, upepya kasuba, upepe pa cungulo, upepyo bushiku.
No mutima onse wise, fya pa nshi ufumye; ku mobyo lefukama, mu nkama upepe.
Ibukishe fibusa, pepela babiyo; pepela babiyo; pepela abalwani, nga balekucusha. Ulombe ngo li weka ifyo ulebulwa; amapepo lomba mwi shian lya kwa yesu.
Nga wabulwe cifulo, mu nkama upepe; lelwa matontonkanyo yabuta yabepo. Mupashi ulekwafwo kwisa na mapepo ya kufika ku mulu kulyu yo umfwa pe.
Tatuli na bupalo ubwaba nga bulya shifwe aletupela nga twaisalomba. Uli ne nsoni, bushe? Kuli yesu pepa. Ibukisha, sekela, lesa likutemwa.

hymns.title: What a friend we have
verses: Yesu e mpalume yesu, fibi fyesu asenda, cisuma tutwale fyonse kwa lesa mu kupepa. Nangu ifwe twayanshiwa, twikatisho kulomba; nangu tulecula, tupepe mu mitima.
Bushe tuli no kweshiwa? Bushe tulecula pe? Ifyo fine twinenuka, kuli yesu tulombe. Mpalume imbi takuli, ya mpomfu ne ya luse; yesu atwishiba bonse, e calenga tupepe.
Bushe twatwikwe fisendo, na maka takukwete? Yesu e katula wesu, mu mapepo tumwebe. Ilye fibusa fyatusha, yesu takatushe’yo, mu maboko atubaka, tukasango butusho

hymns.title: Revive thy work o lord
verses: Milimo mukushe, mube ne fwe bonse; ku maka yenu musose, bomfwe aba bantu.
Milimo mukushe, tulelombela yi; mwike, bahikulu, mwike, mwise mutupale.
Milimo mukushe, mulumbuke konse. Kutemwa kwenu kube pe mu mitima yesu.
Milimo mukushe, mupalya mashiwi; tupoke no busumino mu mitima yesu.
Milimo mukushe, balapilya bengi; shina lyenu lilumbuke, mutupale bonse.

hymns.title: Come kingdom of our God
verses: Ubufumu bwise, bwalusho, lubuto, bulete pano pe sonde mutende na mano.
Mu mitima yesu mwise mutekemo; cilaka ca bololoke cibelelemo.
Ubufumu bwise; mashiwi musalanganye, yapele cikuku.
Bena fyalo bonse bwangu bapalwemo, babe bwananyina bonse, bekale fye pamo.
Ubufumu panwe sonde, mupalya ba calo.

hymns.title: Father, Hear thy children
verses: Tata, mumfwe bamwano, tulelomba ilelo. Twamuwila mwi pepo; twapapata mumfwe.
Yesu, lupanda lweu lwafumye fibi fyesu; twimbile shna lyenu; twapapata mumfwe.
Mwe  mupashi wa mweo, ifwe tatuli bwino, tulelosha ilelo; twapapata mumfwe.
Luse lwatufyalilwe, luse lwatufwilile, luse lwatupuswishe; twapapata mumfwe.

hymns.title: Lord when we bend
verses: Mwe mfumu lintu twapepa ku cipuna cenu, twaiso kuyebelela no kupato bubi.
Lintwi mitima yafina, e lyo mutwelele, no kutumona no luse, kuti tukoshiwe,
Lintu twaesha ne ndimi ukumulumbanya, muleke mitima yesu itotele pamo.
Mifwaile yesu yonse tulete kuli’mwe. Te’ti tutemwishe kantu kano mwatupela.
Tupepe no busumino, kwibukisha shafwe, fyonse ifyatuwamina atupa mu luse.

hymns.title: Our father
verses: Mwe tata, mwe tata tuli pano ku kulumbanye shina lyenu.
Natufwa, natumfwa  ukulila kwa bantwa babulo kwishiba.
Balenda, balenda na mu nshila isha kuya ku bonaushi.
Mukoshe, mukosha ba kusosa, bashimike landwe lisuma.
Bufumu, bufumu bwenu bwise bwangu bwangu mu calo conse.

hymns.title: In the hour of trail
verses: Mu nshita ye tunko mungafwe yesu, epali makana ishina lyenu. Nga natelententa, mulendolesha, kuti nelyo cimo cinengo kuwa.
Nge misamwe ibi mpene mfwaishe, nelye fyume fingi finjite nonke; lyene muncinkule ca getsemane, e lyo njibukishe ca pa kalbale.
Pambi nga mwancusha ku Bwembya bwenu, te kuti’mukanye, nshipikishe  fye pantu mulengwamya, mulenteyanya; bana benu bonse e fyo bacitwa.
Nga bakesantwala ku nshishi pano, leka nkesemona ifya ku mulu. Ni pa cine cenu nshintililepo; mumbule mwe mfumu kulya ku mweo.

hymns.title: God of pity, God of grace
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 174. God of pity, God of grace
verses: Ba luse, ba chikuku, twise ku cinso cenu; pepekeni mu mulu: mumfwe, mutwafwe.
Monsho mo tulongana, lyonse ilyo tupepa. Kulomba, kupapata: mumfwe, mutwafwe.
Ilyo kutemwa kwenu kulebomba muli’few, e lyo twise kuli’mwe; mumfwe, mutwafwe.
Nga twawa no kuluba, no kubulo kutemwa, mu luse mulemwa: mumfwe, mutwafwe.
Ngo bulanda bwaisa, bwa kututininkisha, tuteke ne mitima: mumfwe, mutwafwe.
Fyonse fyo twingalomba mu nshita ya kupepa, mufumye fitucusha: mumfwe, mutwafwe.
ILANDWE LISUMA

hymns.title: Tell me the old, old story
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 175. Tell me the old, old story
verses: Njebe fyo fya kale, fintu fya ku mulu, fya lulumbi no luse fya kwa yesu  kristu. Unshimikile bwino pamo nga ku kanya, pantu nshakwata maka, ndi uwakowela.
Njebe fyebo fya kale, luse lwa kwa yesu.
Njebe fyebo bwino kuti ng’umfwikishe, bupususho bukulu bwacitile lingi, ufinandile lingi, ne ulaba bwangu. Umume wa lucelo taukokola’yo
Ntepeleshe fyebwe fi ne shiwi lyanaka; ibukisha ndi mubi untu afwilile. Unshimikile pe fye fyebo fimo fine, ifya kunsansamusha mu nshita ya bwafya.
Njebako ifi fine ilintu wamona ifyo ifya mu calo fyalaswa finganshe ne lintu mulu wine lesa kanjiswila, unjebe fi fya kale; “yesu akuposha”.

hymns.title: “onse utemenwe!” bomfwe bonse! Tumeni landwe li mu calo conse! Lekeni beshibe abantu bonse: “utemenwe engesa!”
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 176. “onse utemenwe!” bomfwe bonse! Tumeni landwe li mu calo conse! Lekeni beshibe abantu bonse: “utemenwe engesa!”
verses: “onse watemwa! Onse watemwa!” bileni monse mu  mpili ne nika: uwito waluba ni shifwe lesa: “utemenwe engesa!”
Onse uleisa ecelwako; e kuli no mwinshi waisulwako; ne nshila ya mweo yene yabako; “utemenwe engesa!”
“onse utemenwe!” lesa’bila; onse utemenwe!” cebo cashila; “onse utemenwe engesa!”

hymns.title: Just as iam
verses: Ifyo ndi-nshitelebwila, umulopa wansumina, kuli imwe, mwe banjita, mwe mfumu naisa.
Ifyo ndi-nshilepembela kufumya cimo cabipa; kuli’mwe ba kunsamba, mwe mfumu baisa.
Ifyo ndi-mwalinjishiba, napwnampena ne fingi, kulwisha mu mutima; mwe mfumu naisa.
Ifyo-mupina, mpofu; kampoke fyuma fya mpomfu; kwa kufisanga ni kwenu; mwe mfumu naisa.
Ifyo ndi-mwampokelela, kunelela no kunsamba, fyo mwalaya nasumina; mwe mfumu naisa.
Ifyo ndi-kutemwa kwenu kwayanshe filwani bwangu; nomba mwe mfumu ndi wenu; mwe mfumu naisa.

hymns.title: I love to hear
verses: Natemwo kumfwikishe landwe lya kwa yesu; imfumu ya lulumbi yaishile pa nshi; ninaka no kubipa lelo naishiba aishilyo kuntula pantu antemwisha.
Kale yeswa ikele umwana nga ine, ukunango kwikala bwino inshiku pe nalaesho kukonka mu nshila yakwe pe; te’ti andabe ine, pantu antemwisha.
Kuti njemulumbanya, ndemwimbilo lwimbo; nangula nshimumona, wene aleng’umfwa; kabinge alindaya ukuti nkayeko, ukwimba na bangeli pantu antemwisha.

hymns.title: Rescue the perishing
verses: Mwitya baleloba, na bwa balefwa, mubalulule bekaya ku mfwa; mwise na baluba, mwimye abawa, bashimikileni fya kwa yesu.
Mwitya baleloba, na bwa balefwa, yesu wa luse e uletula.
Nelyo bamupata, alindilila, apokelela abalapila; mubatembetembe, mubapapate, alebasamba nga basumina.
Bantu ba bulanda, abapelelwa, kristu wa luse e uleposha, mube ne cikuku, mulebatemwa, bese ku mfufu, ilebakosha.
Mube ne cikuku, e co cawama; yeswa leafwa’bamubombela; bwesheni mu mfifi, fumyeni ku mfwa, bebenya muti, “yesu atula.”

hymns.title: Seeking the lost
verses: Kweko kufwaya abalubile, no kupapata luse luse; yesu ati, “seni kuli ine,” e fyo ne lelo alebeta.
Akuyeni… mu tumishi tonse… kubaleta… abaluba… kubaleta… ku mwine kacema….yesu kristu …. Wabafwilile.
Tubafishe kweka kuli yesu, abanaka na balecula, no kubalanga ubupususho, beshibe mwa kumweno mweo.
Twafwayo kube nkombe sha luse, kukonka krsistu nshiku shonse, twafwe abwa, na bwa banaka, baluba tubalange yesu.
Tucetekele nshita ikesa yeswa kabwela mu lulumbi, natwpeleshe ku mulimo yo, banenswa bengi bapusuke.

hymns.title: Come to the saviour
verses: Mwise kwa yesu, mwikokola, mu nkalati tulange nshila pa kati kesu ali nomba, mwikokola, mwise.
Kulongana no kusekela ne mitima iyabutisha; yesu ne mwe tukalongana ku mwesu ku mulu.
Ushakenye abana kale e uleita imwe mwise; iyi mfumu yenu saleni, mwikokola, mwise.
Tontonkanyeni ali pano, ilandwe lyakwe tesheniko, mashiwi yalesoswa yano; mwikokola, mwise.

hymns.title: Bringing in the sheaves
verses: Tanda ulucelo mbuto sha mutembo, tanda akasuba na pa cungulo; ukalalolela ubulololo, fwe tukesaleta fya kututila.
Fya kututila, fya kututila, tukesasekela pa kututila.
Tanda kalebala, e na mu finshingwa, te kutine mfula nelyo ncito yapwa, pa bulobololo, fwe tukesaleta fya kututila.
Muye mulelila, kutandile mfumu, nelyo fya  bucushi fyatuponena; ngo kulila kwapwa akatusengela, few tukesaleta fya kututila.

hymns.title: There’s a call comes
verses: Kulyu bwite bulemfuma kwi shilya, “leteni ulubuto” kulya bantu ba kuyapokolola, “leteni ulubuto”
Lubuto lwe landwe lisuma lubalikile konse. Lubuto lwe landwe lisuma lubalike pe na pe.
Ilishiwi lya ku makedoniya,” no bupe bwesu twakulatambika, “leteni ulubuto”
Icikuku ca kwa yesu cise pe, tutume ulubuto, ne misango ya kwa yesu ibe fye, tutume ulubuto.
Twinenuka mu kubombe mili, tutume ulubuto, tulonganya ba kwingila kwa yesu, tutume ulubuto.

hymns.title: There are lonely hearts
verses: Kulya bantwa balecula, apwe nshiku shileya; kulya bantwa baleloba, apwe nshilu shileya, fwe tube aba kwafwa bonsha bali mu nshila, fingi kuti kwacita, apwe nshiku shileya.
Shileya! Shileya! Shileya! Shileya! Fwe tube aba kwafwa, apwe nshiku shileya!.
Tube bonsha ba cikuku, apwe nshiku shileya; tube bonsha ba lubuto, apwe nshiku shileya. Abwa bawa, bacenwa, abalile filamba, tweshe ukwimya aba, apwe nshiku shileya.
Fya mu calo filepwa fye, apwe nshiku shileya; fya kwa lesa fyashala pe, apwe nshiku shileya. Mbuto shonse shisuma, ishwa bantu batanda shatwala mu mitima, apwe nshiku shileya.

hymns.title: We  have heard
verses: Ifwe natumfwe landwe, “yesu mupusushi” kabiyeni ne fyalo fyonse, e funde ilya mfumu, “yesu mupusushi”
Bilikisha kwi shilya, “yesu mupusushi,” ku bantu shimikila, “yesu mupusushi” mwimbile mwe filial, mwasuke mwe fyambeshi, nobe calo sumina “yesu mupusushi”
Sanshikisha mashiwi, “yesu mupusushi” pantu alyanshishe mfwa, “yesu mupusushi” tepelesho mutima waikala mu mfifi, ku nshishi sanshikisha, “yesu mupusushi”
Cishibwe fye konse, “yesu mupusushi” ndupwa shonse nashange, “yesu mupusushi” bilikisha ku bantu ba fyalo fya kutali, “natuletelo bumi, yesu mupusushi”

hymns.title: Sing them over again
verses: Mwimbe kabili kuli’ne ifyebo fya mweo! Monyo busuma ne cine, ifyebo fya mweo. E fyebo fya bumi, finjebe fya cine.
Fyaliwama, fyalibuta, ifyebo fya mweo!
Kristu alepela bonse ifyebo fya mweo. Mumfwe ukwita kwa luse, ifyebo fya mweo. Ca bupe, ca cine, cilange fya mwine.
Mmwebe bonse fya katula, ifyebo fya mweo, fya mfumu’yabafwilile, ifyebo fya mweo. Mwe katula wine, muwamye ku cine.

hymns.title: O happy day
verses: Busuma cano bushiku, apo nasanga katuli; mutima wandi wayanga, ndeeba fye’bantu bonse.
Kushuka! Kushuka! Ilyo ansamba ku fibi! No kumfundisho kupepa, no kusekele nshiku pe. Kushuka! Kushuka! Ilyo ansamba ku fibi!
Mulandu onse upwile! Ne wa kwa yesu, nafutwa; ankula ine no luse, na ine nomba ndekonka.
Utushe nombo mutima, wifuma, ku mfumu yobe; e mo umwena fyonse fye, fisuma fyonse ukwete.
Lesa aumfwe layano, akulaumfwe nshiku pe; isuke imfwa ikese, nkalumbe mfumu ya luse.

hymns.title: Sound the battle cry
verses: Iteni fita, bulwi bwafika, imyeni lunga lwa mfumu; ikatisheni, koseleleni, shiwi lyakwe e liletwita.
Akuyeni, mwe bashikale, teyanyeni, shangileni fye; akuyeni no kwimba hosanna, cilongoshi mwine ni kristu.
Koseni bonse, lwisheni fita, twalishibe nkwela ya busumino, lupanga lwe shiwi lya mfumu.
Lesa wa bonse muletwafwa pe, mutupe bonse cikuku; bulwi nga bwapwa, na ifwe twansha.
Tukafwikwe ngala sha mweo.

hymns.title: I’m not ashamed
verses: Ku mfumu yandi ne landwe, nshileba na nsoni; ncindiko lupanda lwakwe, ndame shiwi lyakwe.
E ni ku lupanda e ko nashibukile, kufinwa kwa mutima kwalipwa; uko kwine namwenyo lubuto, nomba ndasekele nshiku pe.
Yesu mfumu, nimwishiba! Ishina lya luse! Te kuti anenge nsoni nelyo kumposa fye.
Naipela kuli yesu, e wampelo mweo; e ukalambaka bwino, nsuke mfike kulya.
Akanumbula ku mulu kuli lesawishi; akampela ne cifulo ku mwabo ku mushi.

hymns.title: Simply trusting
verses: Ncetekela yesu pe, nshita ne nshiku shonse, nangu ilyo nanaka, yesu nacetekela.
Nctekela yesu pe, nshita ne nshiku shonse, nga fyamponena fyonse, ncetekela yesu pe.
Mupashi ulengafwa, ku mfifi ya mutima, ntungululwe mu nshila, yesu nacetekela.
Nyimba ilyo kwabuta, mpepa ilyo kwafita, mwita ilyo nasanswa. Yesu nacetekela.
Ncetekela mu bumi, ncetekela mu mfifi, ku mulu pa kufika, yesu nacetekela.

hymns.title: Pass me not
verses: Mwe katula mwinchila, ndemupapata, apo muleita bambi, mwilancilila.
Yesu, yesu, mumfwe ndekuta, apo muleita bammbi, mwilancilila.
Kampalame kuli imwe, mpelwe uluse, kamfukame no bufuke, nsangyo mutende.
Mu busuma bwenu bweka ncetekela pe. Mulemposha no kunteka, mone no bupe.
Ni’mwe mweo no Buseko, ni’mwe cikuku, umbi pa nshi nshimumwene, nangu mu mulu.

hymns.title: Saviour,like a shepered
verses: Bonse lumbanyeni lesa wesu, luse atubelela; tumutemwe pantu atutemwa. Buku lyakwe lyatweba.
Yesu mwine aishile kuno twaba few bantu: ku kufwayo kupususha fwe bonsha balubile.
Bonse fwaisheni lesa wesu, pantu akulatwafwa; calilembwa lesa aleumfwa bonsha balepalama.
Bonse sumineni lesa wesu, e mo tuleshukila; alefwaya tumucetekele, lyi nshila isuma.

hymns.title: Jesus my lord
verses: Yesu mfumu napapata nga tamwangafwe nalafwe; bupususho mundetele, mumbule fintu ndi.
Mumbule fintu ndi, mumbule fintu ndi, yesu kristu mwamfwilile, mumbule fintu ndi.
Ninaka no kubipilwa, wansumine umulopa, muncite mbe co mwatemwa, mumbule fintu ndi.
Nshikwete mako kucita nangu cimo ca kwitula, muntule pe, ni’mwe mweka, mumbule fintu ndi.
Ndolesheni, mwe katula, muncitile co mwatemwa, mutendeke no kupwisha, mutendeke no kupwisha, mumbule fintu ndi.

hymns.title: There is a fountain
verses: Kafukauka kalipo, mulopa wa kwa yesu, na’bo abalesambwamo balebuta tutu.
Mupupu wafwa sekele pa kafukauka, no mubyu wacila ni’ne, nsambwemo mutima.
Ku busumino namwene filaso fya kwa yesu, nalubulwa mu mfwa yakwe, ntakishishamo pe.
Lwimbo lusuma ndeimba, kupususha kwakwe, na mu mulu nkalaimba kutemwa kwakwe pe.

hymns.title: We speak of the land
verses: Bashuka’balangwe mpanga, icalo ca kwange cibi, balumbule fyawamisha, cawamo kubo mo mwine.
Bashuka! Bashuka! Abaikalo mo mwine.
Musebo e wa nsayabu, e muli ifyawamisha, busuma ne fya bupapo, ne nseko pa kufikamo.
Muli ukutemwa kwa pe, kulya no kufwala bwino, ukwimba e kwawamisha, cawamo kubo mo mwine.
Muli umutende w ape, ububi tabwingililamo, bucushi tabumoneka, ba nseko beka babamo.
Imfumu itungike, tube fye abalingana, e lyo lintu tukafika tukalayanga ne nseko.

hymns.title: Brigthtly gleams our banner
verses: Lunga lulepupa, lwasonto mulu, ukukoselesha aba kwa yesu, kwenda pano pa nshi, e fyo tupepa, no mutima onse kwimba mu nshila.
Lunga lulepupa, lwasonto mulu, ukukoselesha aba kwa lesa yesu.
Yesu mwe shikulu, natusela, pa makasa yenu natulongana, lingi twafutata, lingi twaluka; mutulame, yesu, mu nshila ipya.
Imwe mwalyu mwana, pamo nga ifwe; mutuwamye bonse tucili bana. Mu nshita twasanswa tubukile kuli yesu mwine, te kuli umbi.
Mututungulule nshiku shonse pe, mutwafweko, twanshe balwani bonse. Ebenya bangeli batubake pe; twelelwe, tutulwe, twaya kuli’mwe.

hymns.title: Here we suffer grief and pain
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 197. Here we suffer grief and pain
verses: Kuno tulakalipwa, kuno tulalekana, ku mulu te ifyo.
Cikabe cisuma lintu tatwakalekane.
Bonsha batemwa yesu, bafwa baya ku mulu kwimba na batulwa.
Bana bonsha banono, abapepa mu calo, tabakabulweko.
Basambilishi besu, batwebe fya kwa yesu, nab o bakabako.
Tukalasekela pe, kumono mupusushi pa cipuna cakwe.
Tukaba no Buseko, tukalaimbo lwimbo kuli kristu mfumu.

hymns.title: Knocking! Knocking!
verses: Kunta, kunta, nanyu yu? Ulelinda, musuma? Yangu mwine wa bufumu, takwamoneka ngo yu. We mutima wandi, bushe te ktuti umwiswile?
Kunta, kunta, e pwali, aleinda, musuma; lelwe cibi nacipata, pantu palisapisha; imyunga na bakaenya naiciliko mwinshi.
Kunta, kunta, acili aleinda, musuma, na maboko ayalaswa alekunta pa cibi; alolesha luse luse, alinda, mupusushi.

hymns.title: I will sing of my redeemer
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 199. I will sing of my redeemer
verses: Ndeimbila kalubula, no kutemwa kuli’ne; anculile pa lupanda, ankakwile ku fibi.
Ndeimbila… kalubula… no mulopa…. Ndubwile… anjelele….. pa lupanda…. Amfutilya…. Nkakwile..
Ndeimbila kalubula, ico ampuswisheko; na mu luse no kutemwa amfutilyo mulandu.
Ndeimbila kalubula, ifyo aletwafwo bwanshisho, ifyo aletwafwo kwansha fibi, ne mfwa, na ku mbo.
Ndeimbila kalubula, ne fyo alintemwisha; alimpokolola mu mfwa, kuti mbe mwana lesa.

hymns.title: Stand up for Jesus
verses: Mwiminineni yesu! Ni’mwe fita fyakwe; imyeni uluunga, mwikalulofya mwe. Aletutangilila, fwe mulalo wakwe, asuke abacimfye, abe mfumu eka.
Mwiminine yesu! Sumineni bonse, kalweni na balwani.
E ko alemwita. Kabiyeni bonse, muye mulwe na bo, ikatisheni bonse, mube abashipa.
Mwiminineni Yesu! Mu maka yakwe fye; amaka ya buntunse te kuti yamwafwe. Shangileni, pepeni, mulemutuma lesa, kabiyeni bonse.
Mwiminineni yesu! Ubuta bukapwa; mu calo kulwa pe pe, mu mulu mutende. Uyo wayansha fyonse citebo apelwa, akalateka uko pamo na kristu pe.

hymns.title: I hear thy welcome voice
verses: Ishiwi ndeumfwa, lyanjita kuli’mwe, ukunsamba no mulopa untu wansumine.
Yesu ndeisa, kwisa kuli’mwe, munsambe no mulopa untu wansumine.
Nangula ndi mibi, yesu antemwisha, alefumye mpulumushi, alempela maka.
Yesu alenjita ukukonko mwine; ampelo bucetekelo, luse no mutende.
Yesu alempela maka mu mutima; ne cikuku alentula, amfumya mu fibi.
Yesu amfwilile, pantu nabipilwa, alefwaya musumine mu mutima wandi.

hymns.title: A ruler once came
verses: Mfumu yeswa yaswike nikodemo, uwamubushishe nshila ya mweo, shikulwa ebele, “we kutikisha, mulefyalwa cipya”
Mulefyalwa cipya, mulefyalwa cipya, cine cine nakwebo kupusuka mulefyalwa cipya.
Mwe bana ba bantu kutikisheni, shiwi lya maka lya mfumu umfweni, mwileke shiwi ili limupite: mulefyalwa cipya.
Mwe balefwayo kutusha mu mulu, no kwimbo lwa kuati, “nga mulefwayo mweo, mulefyalwa cipya”
Nomba lelo line wiposa nshita, katwishi cilebakwa po kalewa; shiwi lyati, “nomba!” nobe asuka,
“e, ndefyalwa cipya”

hymns.title: I have heard of a saviour’s love
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 203. I have heard of a saviour’s love
verses: Nig’umfwe fya mupusushi, ukutemwa kwa kupapisha; busha fumine ku mulu pantu anangulukile ne wine? Anangulukile ne wine.
Ici cebo ca cishinka ne calingo kupokelelwa, ica kuti kristu yesu aishile muno calo kutula babi.
Nig’umfwe fyo aculile, pa kuya ku kufwa pa muti; bushe pabo ko calandwa kuti alinculile ine wine? Alinculile ine wine?
Alashilwe pa fya bupulumushi fyesu, afwantilwe pa mpulu shesu; akandilwe pali ifwe, e mo twamweno mutendeno kupola.
Banjebe fyo kuli umulu ukamona bana bam wine; lelo bushe kwabe cifulo ico banteyanisha ine wine?
Mu ng’nda ya kwa tat Mwaba filulwe fingi, acikanabe fyo nga nalimweba, pantu nayamuteyanishisha apa kwikala, kuti tukabe pamo.
Ngasukeni fyo ndebusha, mwe mfumu, takuli ine, ukuti mu mulu muli ncende, na mwe muli katula wandi.
Eya e, yande yande! Eya e, yande! Mfumu yaile ku kalbale kwine, tupusuke iwe na ine.

hymns.title: God loved the world
verses: Lesa wesu atemenwe calo, atumine yesu kutufwila few babi. Aimine ku mfwa. Aile ku mulu aleita ababi. Uyu yesu ni mfumu yak u mulu na pa nshi. Tusumine yesu. Atupele ubumi.

hymns.title: When the roll is called up yonder
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 205. When the roll is called up yonder
verses: Ilye  penga lya kw alesa likomfwikwa mu calo, ilyo bukaca bwa lubuto tutu, ilyo abasalwa bakayalongana pe shilya, ilya keta na mashina nkabeko.
Ilya keta na mashina, ilya keta na mashina nkabeko!
Ubushiku  bwa kutinya ilya bafwa bakema, no kumono bukata bwa kwa kristu; ilyo abasalwa bakayalongana kwa lesa, ilya keta na mashina nkabeko.
Aleni tulebomba shikufwe nshike pe, tuyelanda ku bantu ifya mweo, nge milimo yapwa, ne fwe twaya mu calo cilia, ilya keta na mashina nkabeko.

hymns.title: Shall we gather at the river?
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 206. Shall we gather at the river?
verses: Bushe tuye ku mulonga, ukuli na bangeli, ku mulonga walengama, ku cipuna ca mwine?
E tuleya ku mulonga, tukalongana na ba mushilo; tukayanga pa mulonga, uwatula kwi sano.
Tushe fyonse fishawama; wa luse e utula, akatufwike fyawama, fisamo fya bashila.
Ku mulonga uwawama, ukuli yesu mwine, ku cikuku baletasha, baba ne senge line.
Ne fwe bwangu tukafika, bwangu lwendo lukapwa; e lyo lwimbo lwa mutende lukomfwikwa pen a pe.

hymns.title: Whoever receiveth
verses: Uyo wanakila yesu katula, uwasumina muli mwana lesa, napusuko kwabula ukufuta; yesu e wa maka ya kupususha.
Umfwa we mune, mfumu alekwita! Uluse lwakwe cine lwafulisha, afwilyo kuti ababi batulwe, e wa maka ya kupususha bonse.
Uyo wanakile shiwi lya mfumu, uwasumina ati “Amfwilile” nalubuko kubulwa ukwa pe; yesu e way a kupususha.
Uyo walapila nga lake fibi, uwaipela kuli yesu mwine, napula mu mfwa ingila mu mweo; yesu e wa maka ya kupususha.

hymns.title: Blessed assurance, Jesus is mine
verses: Nombo kwishiba naishiba, yesu antula no kumposha; amfumya mu mfifi na ku mfwa, mu mutima ankoselesha.
Ndi ne cimwemwe, ndeanga pe, ndetasha yesu, mfumu yandi.
Ndi ne cimwemwe, ndeangila ifyacindama fya kwa lesa; mu mutima e mwamoneka maka ya mfumu no kutemwa.
Nombo mutima watalala, yesu na ine bucibusa; ndelindilila, ndelolela, yesu umwine akabwela.

hymns.title: Once more my soul
verses: Cine nig’umfwe landwe lisuma, yesu amfwilile; ne ci cine cilempamfya sana, bushe ndesumina?
Eyo! Eyo! Lesa nga angafwa ndebo mwina mwenu! Fintu mwamfwilile pa lupanda, indeba wenu pe.
Uluse lwenu luntu lwafula, lwankulo mutima; muli’mwe mweka, katula wandi, nalamusumina.
Mwaishibe fyo nshikwetya maka, ndatina ukuwa; nimpenya maka mutumikila, yenu yafulisha.
Na nomba, mfumu, twamupapata, mubafwa ba bonse, kuti bembe no mutima umo, “eyo! Ndeba wenu”
Kale bonse abamulombele, abati, “mungafwe” bwangu bwangu mwabaswike “efyo!” cibe nge fyo nomba.

hymns.title: Return, o wanderer
verses: Bwela, mwana, we waluba, wiso pe mu fibi, wilaba mulanda: bwela, bwela.
Bwela, mwana, we waluba, yesu alekwita; e walenga ufuluke, isa wikokola; bwela, bwela
Bwela, mwana, we waluba, wiposa fye nshita na luse, e nshita atupa. Bwela, bwela.

hymns.title: Sinners Jesus wil receive
verses: Yesu aita babi, abapokelela fye, bonse abalubile, bonse bengabwela fye.
Imbisheni, mwe bonse, yesu aita babi; ati no luse lonse, abapokelela fye.
E wasosa, umfweni, “mwise mubyo mutende; mwe banaka iseni, insende fibi fyonse”
E usambo lubembu, e uposho mutima; nomba ku cilye cakwe te’ti ntine nakalya.
Yesu mweo wa babi, ampokelela ine; nomba nimbuta tutu, nkayafika ku mwine.

hymns.title: When the mists have rolled away
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 212. When the mists have rolled away
verses: Ilyo fubefube aya, na kasuba katula.
Fyonse pa nshi fyabalika, no kunaka ku mfula; no lubuto lwa kwa lesa mfifi yonse lwatamfya, tukeshiba fyonse limbi,
Ilyo fube fube apita.
Tukayaishibana, tukayaendelana, ilyo lwendo pa nshi lwapwa, na ku mulu batwita; tukeshiba fyonse bwino, pantu fube apita.
Lwendo lwesu lwaliyafya, mu mitima mwafita, tulabomba no kunaka, tulekana, tupita; lelo yesu akatila, “iseni mwe bapalwa” tukeshiba fyonse bwino, ilyo fube apita.
Ifwe bonse tukayanga ilyo tukalongana na banensu ba kwi sano; e lyo tukeshibana, tukembila yesu pamo, pantu mfifi yapwa, yaya, fubefube apita.

hymns.title: He dies! He dies!
verses: Alifwile, umuntu wa bulanda, atwikile fibi fyesu fyonse, ashipikisho kuti atutule, alitwanshisha balwani bonse
“ine ndi wa mweo, uwafwile kale; ine ndi wa mweo, uwafwile kale; moneni, ndi wa mweo wa pen a pe, moneni, ndi wa mweo pe na pe. Ine ndi wa mweo, uwafwile kale; moneni, ndi wa mweo wa pe na pe”
Ali nomba mu mulu mu lulumbi, atashiwa na bangeli bonse; wene atuposa ku numa yakwe, no kutusosela, atupususha.
Akabwela ifyo atulaile, akesapoka abantu bakwe, akatwita twikale uko aba, ku cifulo atuteyanishisha.

hymns.title: What did he do?
verses: Mwe umfweni landwe lisuma, kale twalya baluba; yesu afumine ku mulu, cine atupuswishe.
Watupuswishe ni nani? Cine cine mwana lesa1 musango nshi? Atanikwe! Ni kwi aya! Ni ku mulu. E kwa letupapatila.
Takwali umbi kutufwila,nelyo ni nalaika; uwapopelwe pa lupanda e mwana wa kwa lesa.
Ili landwe lya kwa katula bacilli balebila; e kawikishanya twakwata ku kwa kulyo kwa lesa
Iso sumine muntu ali, no kumufukamina; e lyo ukomfwo luse lwakwe, cine akakutula.

hymns.title: Thou art my rock
verses: Cilibwe candi, mwe mupusushi, ni’mwe cubo muntu mfisama. Ni’mwe cilibwe ica kuncinga, muli imwe ndi no mutende.
Cilibwe candi, mwe mupusushi ni’mwe mpalume, ntungulushi; muli imwe e mo ncetekela, e co mfisamina muli’mwe.
Cilibwe candi lintu natunkwa, ni’mwe cilibwe mu kweshiwa. Ni’mwe cilibwe lintu ndecula, muli imwe te kuti ntine.
Cilibwe candi ica kunkosha, impalume yandi ya cine; muli mwe mweka ndecetekela, muncite wa kushangila pe.
Cilibwe candi icikashala, ilintu bufumu bukapwa; cilibwe candi ca bupususho, ndacetekela muli imwe.

hymns.title: When we all get to heaven
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 216. When we all get to heaven
verses: Imbileni fya kwa yesu, ukutemwa no luse, aletutenishisha ubwikalo mu mulu.
Nga twafika ku mulu kukabo kusekela no kwanga; nga twamona yesu, tatwamona yesu tukembilako bwanshisho.
Apo tucili mu lwendo, lingi tukafitwamo; lelo nga twafika kwesu, tatwakafitweko yo.
Natubya ba cine, tutumikile yesu; pa kumumona mu mulu, awe tukasekela.
Aleni! Twendeni bane! Bwangu tukamumona, bwangu mulu ukesuka, ne fwe tukengilamo.

hymns.title: Amid the trials
verses: Mu kweshiwa muntu mpona, mu myunga into nyantapo; mwe mfumu cimo cashala, mulenjibukisha.
Mulenjibukisha! Mulenjibukisha! Ndetina nshi ngo li mupepi no kunjibukisha.
Masakamano yafula ayamfisha ku mutima; ici e cilensekesha, mulenjibukisha.
Mu fyabuta, mu fyabipa, mu fyabuta, mu fyafita, mfumu, tapali mulandu, mulenjibukisha.

hymns.title: Crown him king!
verses: Mufwike ngala kristu mfumu! Mikulo yonse ilumbanye; ululumbi kwi shina lyakwe, nomba ne nshiku pe.
Few tukamucite mfumu mu calo cilye ca lulumbi! Akabe mfumu pe, tukamulumbanya.
Muceleleni, mwe bangeli, mu masese ne nyimbo shonse; bena fyalo baleawile mfumu ya shamfumu.
Ni kacimfya acimfyo bubi, aleteke mitima yesu; mwi shina lyakwe tukansha pe, mfumu ya lulumbi.

hymns.title: Turn thee, o lost one
verses: Bwela, we waluba, we Wanaka, mona kacema akwita lelo; alefwaya ukupususha, mupokelele, wilakokola.
Yesu akwita, e wakutemwa; umfwa kacma alekwita, alekufwaya no kukwita pe, asosa ati, “isa kuli’ne”.
Alekupembela we ulefwa, we walilubo kutali kwine; aliposele umweo wakwe kuti umweo wakwe kuti umone umweo iwe,
Kutika matwi, shi umfwe landwe lya mulungami wakufwalile; alepase fibi fyobe fyonse, no kukupela umweo w ape.
Isa mu musango uwa cine, yesu emwinshi wa kwingilapo; kacema alekusengasenga, wilubantika, isa witabe.

hymns.title: There’s a land that is fairer.
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 220. There’s a land that is fairer.
verses: Kuli calo cisuma sana, tulemona fye no mutima; eko shifwe atulolela, akatupele ng’anda nsuma.
Tukayamonana mu calo cisume cabuta, tukayaikala na yesu na shifwe pabuta.
Palya pasuma tukembila, pamo na bonse abashila, pantu ko bulanda takwaba, takwakabe ca kutucusha.
Ukuli shifwe wa kutemwa, e ko tukayatotela pe pa fya bupe ifyo atupa ne fisuma fya nshiku shonse.
UMULALILO WA MFUMU.

hymns.title: By Christ redeemed
verses: Natulubwa na yesu twabwekeshiwa kwa kristu, tulelange mfwa ya mfumu, asuke se.
Mubili umwa culile e walangwa mu mukate, kutemwa kwesu kufule, asuke’se
Lilya mu kucula kwakwe, mulopa watusumine; tunwe waini fwe bonse, asuke’se.
Ukucula kwakwe kale, pamo no kubwela kwakwe, fyalundwa ne cintu ici, asuke’se.
Lisuke penga lyumfwikwe, ne filindi fikasuke ne shiwi likulu ili, akabwela.
Bucetekelo busuma! Twiikala no bulanda, tulinde no kusumina asuke’se.

hymns.title: This is my body
verses: “E mubili wandyu yo napela; citeni ci no kunjibukiskisha”; mwana wa mpanga, ilambo ni’mwe, ni mwe mukate wesu wa mweo.
“E mulopa wandyu wasumine” asose fi, apisho lukombo; ifyo fine, tunwe ifwe bene, tumfwo Buseko ubwaisapo.
“Nshita yaise,” fyo asosele; mwikale ne fwe, fwe bo mwatemwa; mututebete muku no wine, apo tamulasendwa kuli fwe.
Mfifi ya cunglo ilepona, bulanda mitima twaumfwa; twaimbo lwimbo lwa kulekana, twaumfwa ti, “imeni tuleya”.

hymns.title: Bread of heaven
verses: Kandyo mukate uyu, mukate wa ku mulu; e mubili wa mfumu,
E mukate wa mweo. Mpelwa make nshiku pe mulu yo wamfwilile.
Kanwe waini uyu, waini ku mulu; e mulopa wa mfumu, e waini wa mweo. Mweo wandi ni’mwe fye, nimbwe, nkule muli’mwe.

hymns.title: Jesus great redeemer
verses: Yesu e katula, ntulo ya mweo; mu mitima yesu mubyo lubuto. Lubuto lwa mweo, mfumu itupe; lwa mutende na lo lubalike pe.
Mukate wa babi, no wa ba nsala, filyo fya bakabi fyamokauka. Bupususho bwenu tulebufwaya; lukombo lwa mulu tufwayo kunwa.
Mwe katula wesu, mutwingilile mu mitima yesu, tusangululwe. Tubutishe tutu, mwabuta ni mwe; ne mitima yesu imupalanye.
Ne mwe mwe mupashi, luse lutwafwe, mwikale ku mwesu, ni’mwe cipele, shifwe mutubule, pe shina lyenu, no kupokelela kutota kwesu.

hymns.title: According to thy gracious word
verses: Shiwi lyenu lya cikuku lintu mwatwebele, nomba ndecita, mwe mfumu; nalamwikisha.
Mubili wamfunikila, e mukata wandi; kambulyo lukombo lwenu no kumwibukisha.
Getsmane te’ti ndabe, uko mwanculile mu mulopa na mu mabe; nalamwibukisha.
Nga nalolesho lupanda lwali pa kalbale. Ni’mwe lambo mwamfwilile, nalamwibukisha.
Kamwibukishe, na fyonse fya luse kuti’ne, pe fye lyo ncili umumi nalamwibukisha.
Nge lintu nkabulwa maka ya kumwibukisha, nga mukesa mu bufumu mukanjibukisha.

hymns.title: Iam not worthy.
verses: Nshawamina, mwe shikulu, kuti mumfikile; soseni shiwi limo fye, lya kuti nkakulwe.
Nshawamina, muli ine mwasapisha sana. Mfumu, mwikalemo shani? Soseni, ndepola.
Nshawamina, lesa wandi, lelo nshamukanye. Kukanya uwamfwilile? Awe te’ti kube.
Mwise mundishe nshite yi filyo fya ku mulu, no kwikusho mutimo yu ukutemwa kwenu.

hymns.title: Here O my lord
verses: Ni kuno tumnana, mwe mfumu, ni kuno njibukisha ifyenu; ni kuno njikatishe cikuku, no bunake mposa pali mwe.
Kandye umukate wa kwa lesa, no kunwa ne mwe wain’wa mulu; kuno kampose fisendo fyonse, no kutusha mu kutemwa kwenu.
E nshita ya cilyo ne ya nyimbo, ifya kulye fi namuntebeta; ni kuno kandye, kankokoleko ne mwe, mu nshite yi yawamisha.
Twaima bwangu; nacipwe cilyo, lelo uluse lwenu lwashala; mukate na wain’bafumyapo, lelo mulipo, ni’mwe katula.
Kulya kukonkana no kubiye, fyonse fisonta ku fya mu mulu; fitushimikile fya Buseko fya ku bwinga bwa mwana wa mpanga.

hymns.title: Jesus to thy table.
verses: Ku cintamba ca mfumu, tulye fya kulya fyesu fya mukate wa mulu.
Twafukama kuli’mwe, tumfwe’fyo muli pepi, luse lwenu tutashe.
Twabebeto lupanda, twaikatwo bulanda pa fyabipa twacita.
Nga tulefimpula wain, fwe bonse twibukishe mulopo wasumine.
Tupalame kuli’mwe kuti tusambilile mwatufutile fibi.
Fibi mutukakule, busumino bufule, umutende mutupe.
Mutungulule pe tukasuke tufike no kwikala na imwe.
ISHA BANA

hymns.title: If I come to Jesus
verses: Njise kuli yesu, kuti nayanga; akampo Buseko, ne wa bulanda.
Njise kuli yesu, alampe nseko; aleita pep e, bana banono.
Njise kuli yesu, omfwamapepo, na o alitemwa, alempususha.
Njise kuli yesu, akulansunga; alentungulula ku calo cipya.
E ko balya bana bafwikwa tutu, bamona katula, ni yesu kristu.

hymns.title: Children of the heavenly king
verses: Bana ba kwa kristu, lintu muli mu nshila, imbileni katula, milimo yakwe yonsse.
Tuleenda ku mwesu, mu nshila ya kwa lesa; bamo nabatangila, tukasanga bafika.
Inwineni amenso ku musumba wabuta, ng’anda ilya e ya pe, mfumu yesu ilipo.
Mwilatina, enda fye,calo cilia cisuma; yesu kristu mu nshila aletwafwe mu nshiku pe.
Mwe mfumu twasumina, no kusule fye clo, imwe muletubaka, twalakonka ku mpela.

hymns.title: In our dera lord’s garden
verses: Mwiba bala lya mfumu, ilya pano nse, mulyu tumaluba utwawamisha.
Mulimi ni kristu, fyonse alimba; atemwo tunono no tukalamba.
Wene talesula tuntu tunini; tonse twatemwikwa nankwe, mulimi.
Alitemwa bana pamo na ifwe;alibapalile kale pano nse
Aleita bana, bese bekale mwi bala mu mwakwe, umo ateka.
Mfumu twaitaba, mutusunge pe; muletufundisha tumubombele.

hymns.title: (Tune; Franconia B.H 89)
verses: Within the father’s house
Mu ng’anda mu mwabo umwana nafika, kwi tempele lya kwa wishi umwana naisa
Ng’anda sha mafunde shamucenamina, shapapa mashiwi yakwe ya mano ne cine.
Lelo tabapelwa kwishibe fya cine; ku kusokolole nkama mwaishile ni mwe.
Inkama ya mfumu itula bantunse basubila no kulindo kumoneka kwakwe.
Iseni mwe mfumu, kuti tumwishibe; monekeni, tutemwe.
Ikumbi lya mfifi lipite kuli’fwe, ne mitima ikabuta, bukaca ubwa pe.
Nga twamulolesha tukamwishibisha, ba wishi, mwane, mupashi muli lesa umo.

hymns.title: Iam so Glad
verses: Ndesekela tata wa mu mulu anjebele fya kutemwa kwakwe; mu nkalata ndemone fisuma, icacisha, yesu alintemwa.
Ndesekelela, alintemwa, yesu, yesu, alintemwa. Ndesekelela, alintemwa, yesu alintemwa.
Nga namulaba no kwendauka, na lyo antemwa no ko naluba; ndebwelela bwangu kwa katula, pa kwibukishe fyo alintemwa.
Lwimbo lwandi e lyo nkalaimba, nga namone mfumu ikankala mu kucindama kwakwe; ndesunguka, yesu alintemwa.
Nga bambusha, “waishiba shani”
Nati, “pantu yesu amfwilile” mupashi wakwe unshimikila, unange fyo yesu alintemwa.
Ndi no mutende pa kwishibisha; ndecetekela, nasansamuka; nombo mulwani afulumuka, nga namweba, “yesu alintemwa”

hymns.title: Jesus who lived above the sky
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 234. Jesus who lived above the sky
verses: Yesu uwali mu mulu aishile pano muntu mu lupapulo tumona ifyo wene aliwama.
Aendawike, ni mfumu, kupela menso ku mpofu; na bengi bambya balwele ababelele uluse.
E lyo abebele cine ca kwa lesa, bacicite; e wa cikuku, afuka, atemwo kumfwa ku mwana.
Abantu bamufyengele, asamikwe, atamikwe; yalya maboko yawama pa muti bapampamine.
Ifyo afwike! E co afuminyo ko ku mulu, mu cipingo mwalilembwa, apoka bonsha baisa.
Aishibe balibipa, ne fibi filabacusha; e lyo asosa mu luse, “nintemwo kuti mbafwile”

hymns.title: God who made the Daisies
verses: Lesa uwabumbile maluba yawama, kuti apokelele nyimbo tumwimbila. Nelyo tulya baluba, aletwata, ati, “shi lekeni abana bese kuli ine”
Nelyo tulya banono, mu nyimbo tushipe; abana muli temple abomfwile kale. Mitima nga yafuka, aletweba, ati , “shi lekeni abana bese kuli ine”
Ifyuni pe amonna ifilepupuka; omfwa ifyo filial apasansamisha kabinge pali ifwe alolesha, ati, “shi lekeni abana bese kuli ine”
E lyo tupalamine, kuti tumwimbile; tapali na mulanda wa kuti tutine. Mwi temple lya mutima asosa kuli’few, “shi lekeni abana bese kuli ‘ine”

hymns.title: Gentle Jesus
verses: Yesu kristu mufuke, moneni pali ine; mumbelele uluse, leka njise kuli’mwe.
Ndefwayo kuti njise,imwe mwinkaninina; mu mfumu bwa luse kanyingile kuli’mwe.
Mwana lesa, ninjisa, ndefwayo kumukonka, mwe bal use, ba congwe, mwalyu mwaice kale.
Nimpeni umutima watemwo kunakila. Imwe pe mwalecita kufwaya kwa kwa lesa.

hymns.title: God is always near me.
verses: Pe fye lesalipo, akulang’umfwa; anjishiba mu ncito, na mukwangala.
Pe fye lesa lipo, alamona pe, apafita fititi na pautile.
Pe fye lesa lipo, nangu ndi mwana, ifyo nsosa alifishiba.

hymns.title: I’m a little pilgrim
verses: Ine ndi mulendo, ndi mweni pano; nelyo paliyemba, fibi filipo.
Yesu atutemwisha, akulatungulula, tukasukya tufika kulya ku mwesu.
Ku mwandi kwawama, kushili fibi; no ko ubulanda pe fye tapali.
Lelo umulendo engabutsha, nga’fwaye fifwalo ifya kwa lesa.
Yesu mumbutishe, mumpe cumfwilo; lesa ntungulula pe fye mu lwendo.
Ine ndi mulendo, kuno ndi mweni; ku mulu ku mwesu kuli mupepi.

hymns.title: All things bright and beautiful
verses: Fintu fyonse fyayemba, finono, fikulu, fyonse fyatusungusha, falengwa na yesu.
Maluba yabalula, fyuni ifilila, no tu tupelebesha, konsho ko twangala.
Ne mpili ishalepo, mimane yapita, no kuwa kwa kasuba ukwakashikila.
Umwela e ne mpepo, kasuba, mainsa, mabala ya fisabo, fyonse lesa tupa
Milombwa mu mutengo, icani mu mpanga; amatete no luko, fyonse ifitwafwa.
Amenso yak un ona, ne ndimi sha kweba fyo lesa mukalamba apangee fi fyonse

hymns.title: Jesus loves me
verses: Yesu mfumu antemwa ifi naliishiba, bana bonse e bakwe, banaka, wenya kosa.
Yesu antemwa, cine antemwa, yesu antemwa, baibo anjebe fi.
Yesu mfumu antemwa, mulu anjiswilile; alansambe fyabipa. No kundeko kwingila.
Yesu mfumu antemwa, mupepi muno nshila, nga namucetekela akamfisha ku mulu.

hymns.title: Jesus is our shepherd
verses: Yesu e kacema, e mupusushi; mu maboko yakwe tukatina nshi? Tuye tumukonke, aletangila, nangu ku mulundu, nelyo.
Yesu e kacema, lintu asosa, amashiwi yakwe yasansamusha. Nelyo kalipila, ali ne congwe; atutungulula fwe mpanga shakwe.
Yesu e kacema, atufwilile; no mulopa wakwe atushitile. Atulemba bonse ne shina lyakwe; ati, “abantemwa, bena banandi”
Yesu e kacema, atusunga pe; akatutandwila mimbulu yonse. Nga twapalamina ku mfifi ya mfwa, te’ti tukatine, tukansha ne mfwa.

hymns.title: Little children, praise the saviour
verses: Mwe bana, temweni yesu, amumona ku mulu; mulumbanishisho luse, bapususho bukulu.
E cisuma, e cisuma, ukulumbanya yesu.
Ku mulu ilya fumine, kwisaikala pano, abana balimwimbile, e camupele nseko.
Lintu banyina batwele, kuli wenya banono, mu mabokwa babulile, abapalo bupalo.
Mwe bana, temweni yesu, e mpalume yenu pe; kuno nga mwamulumbanya, mukalalumbanya pe.

hymns.title: God make my life
verses: Muncite mbe ulubuto lwa kubengeshima; kalubingu ka mulilo konse nakulaya.
Muncite mbe kaliluba, kusekesha bonse, akatemwo kubalula mwi bala linono.
Muncite mbe akalwimbo ukwafwa bacula, ulwa kufumyo bulanda no kusansamusha.
Muncite mbe umutambu kwafwa bashakosa, e lyo ku maka mwampela nabatumikila.
Muncite , mweo wandi ube akalwimbo ya cine na ka matotelo.

hymns.title: When he cometh
verses: Ilta kesa, ilya kesa kupende fisamo fyakwe fyonse ifyafina fintu atemwa.
Nge ntanda mu mulu ifwe tuli fisamo, fikalabeka fyonse mu ngala yakwe.
Yesu kristwa kalonganya kwi sano fisamo ifyawama, ifyabuta, fintu atemwa.
Bana bonse, bana bonse, abatemwa yesu, e fisamo ifyafina fintu atemwa.

hymns.title: Around the throne of God
verses: Ku cipuna ca kwa lesa abengi baliko, abana abelelwa, ibumba lya nseko.
Baleanga anga.
Mufifwalo fyabutisha nabafwikwa bonse, mu lubuto baikala, na mu Buseko pe.
Kale bali abanono nge fyo Mwaba imwe; lilya tabaishibe yo ukulumbanye fi.
Bushe cinshi cabatwele ku mulu kwabuta, kuntu Buseko, mutende, no luse fyafula?
Pantu yesu afwililya bana bapusuke; nomba basambwa ku mwiine, bonse nababuta.
Pa nshi bafwile yesu, balimutemenwe; nombe mpumi ya kwa kristu baleimona pe.

hymns.title: Waken Christian children
verses: Shibukeni bana, na mashiwi yenu; “mfumu yafyalwa”
Tuye tumfwaye, tuli, “leka bana bese kuli’ne”
Mwi tanga lya ng’ombe e mwasendama, amulela meri, nyina musuma.
Ku mulu we tanga kulyo kutali, lutanda lunono lulebalika.
Mwitina kwingila, tumuletele fyuma fya mu calo, bupe ku mfum.
Bupe alefwaya, ubo bwacila fyuma fyonse ifyo ifwe twaleta.
Mitime yabuta yena e bupe ubo atemwishisha; tumuletele.
Nomba tuleisa kumucelela, mfumu ya lulumbi yafyalwe lelo.

hymns.title: Day again is dawning
verses: bushiku buleca, mfifi lefuma, na pa kushibuka twime twapepa. Yesu, mwe kacema, namutulinda, paleni fwe bana abo mwasunga
mutwafwe twimbile na pa masanshi, mulandu wa fyonse, filyo na menshi.na pali bamayo, e na batata, pa fibusa na fyo, konsho ko bala.
Tuni tulelila, lekeni twange, tulepupauka na mu lwelele. fwe bali ngo tuni, twimbe nshiku pe, na ku mupusushi watufwilile.
Maluba yalola na ku kasuba, na ko kabalika pali yonsha ya ine nge luba, mbalikileni, pe nkulalosha menso kuli’mwe.

hymns.title: Father we thank thee for the night
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 248. Father we thank thee for the night
verses: Tata tulemutotela pa bushiku na kasuba, butusho, filyo, no luse, ne fitupe nseko fyonse.
Mutwafwe tucite bwino, no kuba bal use lelo, mu milimo no kwangala, tukule mu bwina lesa.

hymns.title: Children of Jerusalem
verses: Twina yerusalemu twalilumbenye yesu, ne mwe bana ba nomba, lumbanyeni katula.
Umfweni fyo balelumbanya, sansuleni ulwimbo.
Natutemwe shikulu, no kubelenga baibo, twishibe fya ku mulu, natutote ku mfumu.
Bakalamba na bana bonse fye baleimba. Mwikatisho lwimbo lu, lufike na ku mulu.

hymns.title: We are but little children
verses: Tuli abana banono, tatwafyelwe bakankala; bushe twalacitila nshi yesu wa luse, musuma?
Ifwe bonse natukwata fyafula fya kucita pe; kushalike fya kwa ciwa, bonse tuleke ifibi.
Lintu mu mitima yesu twatontonkanyo bukali, ilintu ne ndimi shesu twasose shiwi lya nsele.
E lyo cisuma tuleshe ifipumo fya bukali, twilabikana fikansa, kano kwasuko mutende.
E lyo mutende no luse fileikala mu myesu; tubafwe kuti bateke imitima muli yesu.
Bonse bakwato lupanda lwa kuti bamusendele, imilimo yaa cikuku ya kucitila yesupe.

hymns.title: I shall wear a Golden crown
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 251. I shall wear a Golden crown
verses: Ine nkafwale ngala, uko kwesu; nkatule cipe candi, uko kwesu; nkafwikwe fyabuta,nkembila katula,uyo wanondola,uko kwesu.
Uko kwesu,uko kwesu,ubulanda bukapwa,uko kwesu.
Mfifi yonse ikapwa uko kwesu,nkalamono lubuto uko kwesu;lubuto lusuma,lulebengeshima,lwa kuntungulula, uko kwesu.
Nkamono mupusushi,uko kwesu;nkembilo luse lwakwe, uko kwesu; na ku menso yakwe.nyimbo tashakapwe,nkekala nankwe pe, uko kwesu.

hymns.title: It is a thing most wonderful
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 252. It is a thing most wonderful
verses: Cintu ca kupape cibi,ica kupapisha nga nshi,mwana lesa aishile ku kufwila ne mwaice.
Nishishibe fyo ca cine atemnwe ukwicefya.aculishe, amfwilile,pantu mwine antemwisha.
Nshishibe fyo engantemwa ne mubi wa mwaice ne;kutemwa kwakwe kwakula,afwilyo kuti mutemwe.
Kutemwa kwakwe kuli ne cintu ca kupapa cine lelwe ci campele nsoni:nalimutemwa Panini.
Kamutemwishe, mwe mfumu,kamwimbile no mutima,
Nakulaya ndamutemwa tukasukya tumonana.

hymns.title: Great God and wilt Thou
verses: Mwe lesa muli bakulu,Mwaba tata na katula.ine mupina mwancila,bene ba calo no mulu.
Tata bushe musumine ukumfwa mapepo yandi, nangu kumfwa malumbanyo ayo naleta ne mwano?
Ni mwe tata muleke mbe mwana wenu wa bupete;mu kulanda,mu kubomba,kanchite fintu mwatemwa.
Ni mwe tata, ncetekela muli imwe mwe katula. Ndefwayo kwenda mu nshila iyo imwe mwampingwila.
Mwe tata, ilyo shikapwa nshiku shandi muno calo,mukansende mu kutemwa, njikale ne mwe ku mulu.

hymns.title: Be the matter what it may
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 254. Be the matter what it may
verses: Muli fyonse, mune we, sose cine pe; mu kwangala, mu ncito, sose  cine pe. E musango wawama, ulembe pa mutima, watupele ni lesa, sose cine pe.
Cine cili ca mweo, sose cine pe; bufi buli bwa mwenso, sose cine pe. E wa mwenso no musha, utemwa ukubepa, iwe wesho kushipa; sose cine pe.
Nga wabepa lapila, sose cine pe; pe fye ube wa kwansha, sose cine pe. Uwabepa lesa, lelo iwe shangila; sose iwe cine pe.

hymns.title: Lord a little band
verses: Mwe mfumu, ifwe fwe bana, natwisa tumwimbile; mwe bam aka, mwaliwama, ne fwe tumucindike. Tubike mitima yesu pali yesu ok ali; twilatemwa nangu cimo icimulenge nsoni.
Mfumu yamona kwi sano ifya bana bacita; ilelemba ne milimo mutusambe tube tutu, tutine ifya bubi; mutwenshe mu nshila yenu, tufike uko muli.

hymns.title: When from Egypt’s house
verses: Ba kwa lesa bafumine mu busha, baile pamo na bana, balelola pasuma; aba bana baleenda ku mpanga.
Bayabwike na yordani, bafika ku kanani, baikele umutende, ne fisuma bamwene. Aba bana inyimbo batotele.
Mwe katula, ne fwe tube abalendo nga balya; imwe mwalitulubula ku fibi na ku ciwa. Nomba ne fwe twende ne mwe mu mpaanga.
Yesu, mututungulule, muchinge ku kasuba; e lye mfifi nga yapona, mubutushe inshila; mututule kuli fyonse fyabipa.
Nga twafika ku mumana wa kutinya wa mfifi, mube na ifwe mu menshi, mutwabusho mutende; mutandule umwenso wesu onse.
Ilyo lwendo lwesu lwapwa, tukamona pasuma; tukekala na bashila, abana ba mu ng’anda; few bashuka, tukalatasha  lesa.

hymns.title: There is a city bright
verses: Uliko musumba, usuma ku mulu; takuli cintu ca kukowesha icingafikako.
Katula ninjisa, no kumupapata, kuti munsambe, kuti munsambe ku fyabipa fyandi.
Kristu ndefwaisha kubo mwana wenu; munsunge bwino, munsunge bwino pa kuluba kwandi.
Kuti njikaleko ku mulu na imwe; kubuta tutu, kubuta tutu, mu calo ca luse.

hymns.title: There is a better world
verses: Ciliko calo cisuma, cabuta! Cabuta! Uko takwaba fyabipa, cabuta! Cabuta!
Baleimbako inyimbo, bantu basuma babako, ne filimba balishako; cabuta! Cabuta!
Kulya kushili makumbi! Ca nseko! Na nseko! Nelye filamba takuli, ca nseko! Ca nseko! Balenwa menshi ya bumi pa cinso mupusushi; ulubuto e ko luli, ca nseko! Ca nseko1.
Pantu tuli ababipa, afwile! Afwile! Pantu tatuli mutende afwile! Afwile! Tusambwe ku fibi fyonse, no kupelwa umutende, kuti twikale nankwe pe; afwile! Afwile!.

hymns.title: There is a happy land (Jude’s Tune)
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 259. There is a happy land (Jude’s Tune)
verses: Kwabe calo uko, icawama, ukwa basumina baikala. Baleimbila pe mfumu yesu katula, baleikatisha, balelumbanisha, mfumu ya pe.
Tuye ku calwe ci, twende bonse; mwiiminina fye, tuye pamo. Tukalasekela lyo malanda yakapwa, kwikala ne mfumu mu calo ca mulu, kushuka pe.
Ku calwe ci cine tukafika, shifwa katusunga, atemwa pe. Kuli ululumbi, kulya kwaliwamisha, kwabuta, kwabuta, kushili bulanda, atemwa pe.
INSHITA SHIKALAMBA

hymns.title: O Lord of heaven
verses: Mfumu ya mulu na pa nshi, kuli’mwe kubyo lulumbi, tulangyo kutemwa shani kuli imwe?
Twaikala no mutende, pantwi fisuma twapelwa, kuli imwe twatotela, mwatupa fye.
Mwana wenu umo wine, mwabike lambo lya cine, no luse lwafula lwine mwatupa fye.
Umupashi wa mushilo, maka n mweo no luse, aishilyo kuba ne fwe, mwatupa fye.
Bantwa bengi balubulwa, mpulumushi shaelelwa, ba shifwe twamutotela, ba shifwe twamutototela, mwatupa fye.
Twatotela kuli’mwe, mweo, mutende na fyonse; twikalile nenu pe, mwatupa fye.

hymns.title: Standing at the portal
verses: Nomba pa kwingila mu mwaka upya, tuleumfwe shiwi, twasansamuka. Shiwi lya kwa shifwe lyatepesha; lyatupela maka, lyatusekesha.
Twende no kushipa, bana ba mfumu, pantwi shiwi lyakwe lyabelelela.
“Ne lesa ndi ne mwe, fyo nasosele; nakulamfwa pe, te’ti mutine. Ine ndemubaka, kuboko kwandi kukamwiminika ku cinso candi.
Mwako uletampa, mu luse lwakwe bonse bakamona fya bupe fyakwe. Babi na balanda, balwele pamo, kuli aba bonse kulyu bupalo.
Te’ti atulabe, nangu kutusha, pantu alaile kuba na ifwe. Tumucetekele mwako no wine, lesa ali ne fwe nshiku shonse pe.

hymns.title: Another Year
verses: Umwaka umbi wapiti, lubilo lubilo; twaise lelo kupepa no kwimba ulwimbo.
Twaisa…twaisa…twaisamucelela, twaisamucelela, twaisa….twaisa… twaisa no lwimbo
Twaisalumbanya yesu no kwimbilo luse lwa uletwita ku mulu, e utubaka pe.
Twalumbanishe ca bupe ca mwako yu wapwa, twaimbe layano lyakwe no kusanshikisha.
Yatote mitima yesu umwaka naupwa, twacetekela mwe yesu pali uno upya.

hymns.title: We plough the fields
verses: Tulima no kutanda imbuto shisuma; lelo icishimesha maka ya kwa lesa. E utupele mfula kunasho mushily, atuma na kasuba kuti filyo fipye.
Fyonse ifisuma fyafuma ku mulu. Mutotele, mutotele, pa luse lwakwo lu.
Eka fye ni kabumba wa fintu fisuma, awamya amaluba, no kubeshe ntanda yamumfwa amabimbi, utuni alela; lelo kucila ni’fwe fya kulya atupa.
Mwe shifwe twatotela pa fisuma ifyo; kutanda no kusepa, bumi, maka, filyo. Tatwakwata fya bupe, fyonfe fili fyenu; mulefwaye ca bupe ca  mitima yesu.

hymns.title: Hush! Blessed are the dead
verses: Abafwa bashuka, nga bali kw yesu; balalike mitwe pa cifuba cakwe.
Kulya kwawamisha mfifi tayabako; ni yesu bamona, bamutemwa uko.
Ifyabacushishe fya muno mu calo, nomba fyapwa fyonse, tafibacusha’yo.
Kacema musuma atungululako, kushili bulanda, kuli fye inseko.
Tuli ne filamba, fwe bashiwa pano, twabaloshe cibi, no kubafuluka.
Shiwi lya munensu twatemenwe cibi; nomba tatumfwa’yo fyatalala fyonse.
Munensu we, waya, twalikutemwisha; twalikulila nomba – yesu alilile.
Bwang bukesaca, yesu tukamumfwa, kuli’fwe akati: “bukeni no kwanga”
ISHALUNDWAKO

hymns.title: For all the saints
verses: Pa bantu benu abafwile kale, abatusha ku milimo yabo, shina lyenu litotelwe, mfufu; aleluya! Aleluy!
Mwe cilibwe, linga, no bulamba, mwali mushika wabo mu bulwi, mwali lubuto lwabo mu mfifi.
Fita fyenu fya cine no kushipa, filwe nga balelwa aba kale; bakafwikwe citebo ca mweo.
Bulwi bwakosa, tabulepwa bwangu, lelo lwimbo lwa kwansha tulomfwa, nomba ne fwe twamwenamwa maka.
Kasuba kawa ne mfifi yaisa, fita fyasukwa fitusha fyonse, kwa lesa kwabo mutende w ape.
Bwaco bushiku bumbi bwa lulumbi, bwa kwimamo abashilishilwa, ne mfumu kristu naimoneka.
Ku mpela sha fyalo ne sha fimana, kwaisa makana ya ba kwimba, kuli wishi, mwane, no mupashi.

hymns.title: O brother have you told?
verses: We mune, ifyo waelelwe fibi, twapapata mune uletwebako; no mo waishile ku watanikwe, twapapata mune uletwebako
Bushe nomba uleenda bwino? Bushe nomba wabuta tutu! Bushe shikulu e Buseko bobe? Twapapata mune uletwebako.
Utwebeko twapapata, utwebeko kabili. Utwebe fyo wapusuka, cilekukosha mu nshila; twapapata mune uletwebako.

Bushe yesu alekwata  mu nshila? Twapapata mune uletwebako. Bushe akwitaka na ku kubuko? Twapapata mune uletwebako. Awe takwaba mpalume ngo yu, yesu e mpalume ya cine. Kanshi calingo kuti bonse bomfwe twapapata mune uletwebako.

Awe ili lyashi lyaliwamisha, twapapata mune uletwebako; lyacile filoto fisuma nga nshi, twapapata mune uletwebako. Kuli bamo bulanda bwacila, bafilwo kumono mutende; kanshi ubalandile fya kwa yesu, twapapata mune uletwebako.

Ifyo walwisho mulwani no kwansha, twapapata mune uletwebako; cilekosho bwa basumina nomba, twapapata mune uletwebako. Tulela ne fita fya kwa satan, limbi tukateka na kristu; kanshi tufishe bambi kuli yesu; twapapata mune uletwebako.

hymns.title: I know I love thee better lord
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 267. I know I love thee better lord
verses: Nakutemwisha we mfumu, ukucila fyonse; fintu wampelyo mutende, ushakaputulwe.
Napapa cine napapa, ukutemwa kwakwe; kuti nafilwo kulanda ifyo antemwisha.
Ninjishibo li mupepi, mweka mu mutima; na pa kutontonkanye ci, mutima wayanga.
Wambikilemo Buseko, e co ndasekela; pabulo kutemwa kobe, ye! Kuti nafitwa.
We mfumu, katula wandi nnga cabe fi nomba, batini cikaba shani lyotukamonana?

hymns.title: The is risen
verses: Yesu aliima mu mfwa mwine, atupingwilile pa lupanda; aliima, ifwe natubinga, atusangulwile no mulopa.
Yesu aliima mu mfwa mwine, ne fwe twaimine pamo nankwe; aliima, cilye nacipita, muli wene tuli fyo mutende
Yesu aliima mu mfwa mwine, natutulwa no mulopa wakwe; aliima, mwa lesa e mwesu, imitima ili uko kwine.
Yesu aliima mu mfwa mwine, natangila, ne fwe tulekonka; aliima, twatotele mfumu, nutwanshishe mfwa, watulubwile.

hymns.title: I am trusting thee, Lord Jesus
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 269. I am trusting thee, Lord Jesus
verses: Ine nakucetekela, we mfumu yandi; walimweno bupususho, bupe no luse.
Ncetekela, iwe weka fye, ncetekela, cine, iwe weka fye.
Ine nakucetekela kuti njelwe; umfushisho luse lobe, nakupapata.
Ine nakucetekela, we wamfwilile; nsangululwe no mulopa wa ku kalbale.
Ine nakucetekela, mpelakwa maka; mafunde yantu ulempa yakulankosha.
Ine nakucetekela, wilandeka ngwe; nakucetekela pe fye, mfumu ya fyonse.

hymns.title: Where will you spend eternity?
verses: We bushe ukekala pi? Ili lipusho lyalyafya, njeba mune napapata, we bushe ukekala pi?
Njeba mune napapata, we bushe ukekala pi?
Bamo balesala kristu, no kuleke fibi fyabo: mu mulu mukaba mwabo. We bushe ukekala pi?
Bambi baleulo mweo, baleya ku bonaushi; kulya ba cikaba shani? We bushe ukekala pi?
We shi sala kristu nomba, cetekelo luse lwakwe; e lyo uleisosesa, “ine nkekala mwa lesa”
Nkekalamo, nkekalamo, ine nkekala mwa lesa.

hymns.title: God’s Almight arms are round me.
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 271. God’s Almight arms are round me.
verses: Mu maboko ya kwa lesa, ndyu mutende; cilye te kuti cimpamfye, ndyu mutende. Yesu e wampingwililwe, amfwilile, andubwile, ne muntungwa ndasekela, ndyu mutende.
Cipupu nelyo cacila, ndyu mutende, awe te ti nkungumane, ndyu mutende, bulwi nelyo bwise fimbi, ine te’ti ndekyo kwimba, yesu talendekelesha, ndyu mutendekelesha, ndyu mutende.
Mu kweshiwa apalama, ndyu mutende, kufunda kwakwe kwayana, ndyu mutende; limo limo alencusha, natotela ninjishiba, afwaya fyo kung’wamisha, ndyu mutende.
Lyonse ilyo nashibuka, ndyu mutende, no bushiku nga bwaila, ndyu mutende. Awe te’ti ntine fya mfwa, yesu mwine alendamo, ne lintu nketwa ku mwakwe, ndyu mutende.

hymns.title: When my life work is ended
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 272. When my life work is ended
verses: Pa kupwa kwa milimo no kwabuko mumana, ilyo bukaca ubwa kusekala; nkeshibo mulubushi pa kufika kwi shilya, e ukabalilo kunsekelela.
Nkamwishiba, nkamwishiba, ku mikofu mu ndupi shakwe.
Kukaba ubuseko pa kumumomo mwine, uwa mpumi yawamisha yayemba; nkalatasho kutemwa ne cikuku cikulu icanungikile ncende yawama.
Abanenswa bengi balekela mwa lesa, ndebukishe fyo kale twalekene; tukayakumanako ne nyimbo sha Buseko, lelo kucila nafuluka yesu.
Nkafwikwa ne fyabuta pa kwingila mwa lesa, mwene tamwakabe ifya bulanda; mu lwimbo lwa kutota ine nkasanshikisha, cacila nkamona yesu katula.

hymns.title: Praise to Jesus, His mercy is free
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 273. Praise to Jesus, His mercy is free
verses: Yesu katula alumbaniwe, e wa luse, e wa luse! We mubi, yesu alekutula, e wa luse lwafula! Shi wingasumina akupale, e wa luse, e wa luse! No mweo w ape alekupela, e wa luse lwafula!
Yesu katula atekufwaya, alefwaya no kufwaya; mu kutemwa kwakwe alekweta, akufwaya no kwita.
Ni pa cinshi wasulila yesu? E wa luse, e wa luse! Yesu aleti, “wise kuli’ne” e wa luse lwafula! Leko bubi, sh’isa wikokola, e wa luse, e wa luse! Yesu alekupususha nomba, e wa luse lwafula!
Tontonkaya pa kutemwa kwakwe, e wa luse, e wa luse! Afwilyo kuti upusushiwe, e wa luse lwafula! Lapila, wipele kuli wene, e wa luse, e wa luse! Umunakile, alekukosha, e wa luse lwafula!

hymns.title: Now in a song of grateful praise
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 274. Now in a song of grateful praise
verses: Mu lwimbo lwa kutotela, ndesanshikisha ku mfumu, ndeimba na bwa bashila; “Yesu fyonse aliwamya”
No kucila fyonse ndetila, “Yesu fyonse aliwamya”
Ine napapa sana fye, ukutemwa kwakwe kwine; angapwile mu mulilo; “Yesu fyonse aliwamya”
Katunka alicenjela, ilingi fye alampamfya; lelo ine ndatila fye: “Yesu fyonse aliwamya”
Ilintu nkafika mwakwe, lwimbo lwandi lumo lwine, e lwimbo lwa kutotela: “Yesu fyonse aliwamya”

hymns.title: When Jesus comes to reward
verses: Lyo yesu akesatulambula, akamoneka bwangu; bushe tuli ba kumulolela, bushe tuli ba kumulolela, na mafuta mu nyali?
Bushe tuleti, “natwiteyanya pa kwingila mwa lesa?” bushe akatusanga tuli fye, ilyo mfumu yesu ikesa?
Nga katwita pa lucelocelo, fwe bonse umo umo; pa kumubwesesha matalanta, bushe akatutasha?
Bane, muli’fi fintu twashilwa, bushe tucita bwino? ,u ,itima nga tamwaba kantu, tukatusha fye uko.
Bashuka bakasangwa bali fye, bakasekela nankwe; nelyo akesa pa kashita nshi, bushe natwiteyanya!

hymns.title: Years I spent in vanity
verses: Myaka ingi naposele fye, nasulile uwatanikwe, nshaishibe fyo amfwilile, ku kalbale.
Bwingi bwa cikuku no luse; alipashile fibi fyandi. E ko ne musha nalubwilwe, ku kalbale.
Ilyo lesa nshininyo bubi, e lintu mwenso wanjikete; nasuka napilibukila ku kalbale.
Awe nomba ndi wa kwa yesu, na o nomba ni mfumu shonse ndeimbe fya kalbale.
E bupususho bwa kutasha, bwaletelwe no luse lwakwe; wene ifyo kalbale.

hymns.title: In the land of fadeless day
hymns.titleWithHymnNumber: 277. In the land of fadeless day
verses: Mu mpanga ya kwa lesa, mu musumba ulya, tukalabelela pe, bushiku takwaba.
Ne filamba no mwenso, nelye mfwa ne misongo, tabalepende myaka, bushiku takwaba.
Mpongolo shabekesha, mu musumba ulya, pa nshi pa nsahabu, bushiku takwaba.
Mpongolo tashisalwa, mu musumba ulya, mumana uleya pe, bushiku takwaba.
Tabafwaya kasuba, mu musumba ulya, pantu yesu lubuto, bushiku takwaba.

hymns.title: Sweet hour of prayer.
verses: We nshita ya mapepo we, watwita kuli ba shifwe, ukuti tusokole fyonse ifiletupamfya, pa kwitaba ku bwityo bu. Twapusuka ku matunko, na satana atufilwa pa kwise nshita ye pepo.
Twayako bwangu ne nsansa ku cifulo icasontwa kukumana na katula pa kwise nshita ye pepo.
We nshita ya mapepo we, watwala malombo yesu ku wa cishinka ne cine uwatemwo kutupala
e watwebo kumufwaya, cine twamucetekela; atusendela macushi, pa kwise nshita ye pepo.
